name: Zac
description:
Zac Woof-ron is a heartthrob movie star looking to settle down with the right person! 

As you know from his movie career, Zac is a 2-year-old, purebred red heeler male, about 37 pounds and high energy. After finishing his press tour for his latest movie, âMission Impossible: ACDâ, Zac came into foster care with ACDRA with the goal of retiring from the fast-paced motion picture industry and finding a forever home. Accordingly, Zacâs publicist agreed to finally let us share his full life story so far. You see, Zac was tied outside for most of his young life, with little to no interaction with people or other dogs. When his owner died, he was taken to a shelter in NC.  Zac has been in foster care on a farm with 2 other ACDs, cows, and horses. 

Although he is a bit slow to warm up to new people, Zac quickly becomes your best friend. He absolutely must be with his person at all times and gives the best body hugs ever! He has great recall and therefore a fence isnât required. He would do best with an energetic person in an active home with a yard that is dedicated to exercising him mentally and physically. Zac would make a great running, biking, or hiking partner or even agility dog. Inside the house, Zac isnât destructive (he has had free run of the house) although he does like to relocate his foster dadâs clothing around the house, and he settles right down to snuggle on your lap. He is already mostly potty trained and has learned to use the doggie door, sit, lie down, and wait. He will be easy to train as he is smart and highly food motivated. Zac loves to ride in the car and walks well on the leash. He has begun to show some interest in toys and fetch. Although Zac typically sleeps on the bed with his foster dad and canine housemates, he has occasionally been crated during the night and does just fine.  

Zac would thrive best in an ACD-experienced home without children or cats. He needs a patient person who will be able to harness his energy (and occasional mouthiness) in order help him achieve his full potential as a good canine citizen through training and exercise. Although he gets along with his foster brother and sister, they are no match for his energy level. Therefore, Zac requests a home with another dog who likes to chase and roughhouse as much as he does! 

Zac is neutered, microchipped, heartworm negative, and up to date on HW and flea/tick prevention.He is located in Adamstown, MD.

For questions, please contact mdrancherld@yahoo.com.

COMPLETE AN APPLICATION
http://www.acdra.org/adoption-application

name: TATE
description:
Tate is an adorable 2 year old, 22 pound Cockapoo.  She came to use from a local shelter where her owner had turned her in.  Her owner was older and didn't have the time or energy for Tate.  She came to us with a condition called Microphthalmia.  This is where one eye is very small and often with other abnormalities.  Tate could not see out of the eye and it was uncomfortable for her.  We removed the eye which is completely healed.

Tate is very affectionate. She loves to play with toys and with other dogs.  She loves to cuddle in bed and on the sofa.  Tate is house trained and crate trained.  She loves her walks but needs more leash training.  We're working on it..   She likes to ride in the car.  Tate does sleep in bed.  She is good with respectful children that are 10 or older.  Tate would love another dog to play with but would be fine with an interactive family that has a lot of time for her.  We introduced Tate to cats and she would definitely chase if the cat would run.  It doesn't appear that she would hurt the cat but unless the cat was VERY laid back she would do best without a cat in the home.

Tate is a sweet girl that had little training in her early life.  She is very smart and eager to please.  She and her new owner would have a lot of fun in an obedience class.  Tate quickly learned to ring bells at the door to go outside but then took it a bit too far by ringing them too much.  This shows us that she is eager to have an active family that will do a lot of things where she can be included.  

Tate's adoption requirements are a fenced yard or area large enough for her to run and play that leads directly into the home.  She is not a candidate for an underground fence.  Tate needs someone who is not working a typical 8 hour work day; someone that works very part time, works from home and can their dog in their work space or someone that is retired.  She would love children that are 10 or older in the home and would do super with another playful dog.  If she is an only dog the family must be active with the time and desire to have a dog involved in a major part of their life.  After having very little attention for the first two years of her life, Tate deserves to have a home where she is cherished.  Tate's new home must continue with her natural care program.  We will place Tate within an hour drive from Akron, OH. which includes the Cleveland, Akron/Canton, Youngstown area.

Star-Mar Rescue is a natural care provider and we place our dogs in homes that are already on a natural care program or are eager to learn. We use no chemicals on our dogs, no commercial flea products (oral or topical), do blood titer testing instead of randomly vaccinating. Our yards are without fertilizer and weed killer and our homes are toxin free. We feel that dogs can be protected without being harmed by harsh chemicals and unnecessary vaccinations and do best on a species appropriate, no grain, raw diet. Frozen raw diets, freeze dried or dehydrated no grain. Raw, no grain foods are easily gotten at many pet stores and on line and are no more expensive than a high quality dry food. This simple step will provide your dog the nutrition needed to keep them healthy and happy for many years unlike feeding a lifetime of processed foods. We are happy to help with this transition. For more information go to Star-Mar Rescue Natural Care facebook page and click on \"videos\" in the column to the left and watch the 7 part series called The Truth About Pet Cancer. It will give you an understanding of what we are doing and why. Please do some research on natural care and raw feeding and decide whether or not you are wanting to care for Tate in this manner before requesting an application.

If you feel that your lifestyle and environment meet with Tate's needs, please directly contact Martha at learymjri@aol.com or call 330-466-3667 or 330-262-0515 for an application or more information. PLEASE DO NOT USE THE LINK PROVIDED AS IT IS NOT ALWAYS RELIABLE. Tate's adoption will require an approved application and a home visit, with adoption completed at her foster home in Akron, OH. Tate's adoption fee is $275. We will work to place her within an 1 hour driving distance from his foster home in Akron, OH. so that we can conduct a home visit bringing Tate with us. This includes the Cleveland, Akron/Canton, Youngstown, Elyria, Loraine areas of OH. 

STAR-MAR RESCUE IS REGISTERED WITH THE OHIO DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE AS REQUIRED BY LAW

name: Trixie B
description:
Meet Trixie... she is a female 2yr. Old Chihuahua mix . She is about 10 to 12 lbs. She is very sweet , quiet , and calm. She is housebroken. She is great with other dogs. She came into rescue pregnant, and heart worm positive. . All her puppies have been adopted, so its her turn to find a loving home. She has went through her treatment . She is doing great!SB posted 9/15/19
**It is rare that we know with certainty the ages or mixes that make up our wonderful dogs, but we do our best to be as accurate as possible based upon our many years in rescue.
** Adoption: $325 which covers quarantine, shots, worming, food, medical records, spaying/neutering,microchip and an Alabama State Health Certificate. Transport, if needed : $120.00 We consider the transport to be of great importance and, as such, take particular care of the dogs during the trip from Alabama. We make every effort to arrive with healthy and minimally stressed dogs.

name: Moric
description:
What a sweet boy Moric is! A 1-year-old mix of Lab and Hound, he will weigh 45 pounds when mature. His short and sleek coat is mostly white with a bit of tan/red here and there. (Check out that ear!) Even better than his good looks, though, is his gentle temperament and loving nature. He gets along well with people and loves to play with his doggie pals. Oh, and he really loves playing with his toys! In fact, while he was posing for his pictures, he even used one to lie on so that we could get just the right shot of him! A fine boy! What's most important about him, though, is that he is a gentle, sweet, and loving boy who needs a lot of TLC. You see, he was in really bad shape when he came into rescue; he had been DUMPED and ended up in a kill shelter. This boy needs you; he needs your love, and he needs to have someone to give his love to. Sweet! Sweet! Sweet Boy! (posted 9/11/19, ME)

name: Aliena
description:
Whether they look alike or not, puppy litters are always wonderful! Our three A puppies are a mix of Lab and Shepherd. They're typical pups! They love to play, love to love, and love to stick their noses in where they might not belong. Aliena is a girl with a gold and white coat, and lovely amber eyes! She weighs between 16 and 18 pounds. Her sister's coat is black and white with a bit of a wave, and she also weighs between 16 and 18 pounds. Their brother Albert, however, is tricolor and weighs approximately 18 and 20 pounds. name: Rebel
description:
People often ask if we know their new dog's history, and we usually don't. Rebel is different, though. A lady drove up to our rescue with two dogs and a litter of newborn puppies in her car. She told us that she no longer had a home and could no longer keep the dogs. She asked that we take the dogs, and, of course, we did. Rebel is one of them. A 1 year old, 18-pound mix of Chihuahua and Miniature Pinscher, Rebel's short, black coat glistens in the sunlight and you can't help but stroke his back. Perhaps because of his lack of security prior to coming to us, he needs a bit of time to warm up to you, but when he does, he'll be your best buddy! (posted 7/5/19, ME)

name: Bailey R
description:
Bailey's foster accidently took him in because, although he was the neighbor's dog, Bailey decided he preferred him over his original owners. He kept getting away from them and coming to the foster's house. The neighbors said he could stay. And the foster would happily keep him; he's a good dog. However, this one-year-old German Shepherd mix goes after cats and doesn't really like the foster's other dog. Never having been aggressive towards people, he likes people in general as he has had successful visits to the vet and other places. We don't know for sure about children. He is an intelligent fella who needs some training; his foster feels that he hasn't been trained prior to living with him. He needs to be reminded not to jump on people when he happily greets them; he forgets that he weighs 50 pounds. Bailey might do best in a home with not other pets, and a fenced backyard would be great! (POSTED 5/26/19, R)

name: Juicy Ms Jenette
description:
Hi there, my name's Jenette but my friends all call me âJenniâ and YOU should too cause EVERYONE is MY friend ! I'm an 4 to 5 year old, spayed female Dutch Shepherd who Mare swears is far more like a 3 year old, energy wise... probably as she's far more accustomed to those lethargic lumps she calls âBullysâ though they're all very nice, lol. I'm known to be a FABULOUS playmate for other dogs; helping Mare here in rescue by stabilizing THREE young males and teaching them the ropes... Hey, someone's gotta to teach those boys their social skills and manners ! (hehe) I'm also an athletic person's dream ~ you like walks, hiking or running, Iâm your girl ~ I can be the the consummate athlete OR charming couch potato to echo YOUR choice for the day ! I'm just a sweet, LOVABLE clown that ADORES hugs and spending quality time with my human and canine friends. I enjoy all my friends at our multi dog indoor foster home and am SUPER NICE to everyone I meet ~ it always pays to be a Lady so I've worked diligently to learn that skill as well. I have a STABLE, even temperament; am HAPPY, intelligent, EASY to train, AFFECTIONATE, extremely GENTLE and very well behaved indoors knowing thatâs the place to be kicked back. Iâm a very SWEET girl whoâs SUPER well socialized, housebroken, crate trained and I even sit nicely for treats (immediately AND without being asked, thank you very much :) I loooooove to play and especially enjoy car rides and looooove playing in the water! I have a heart of gold, and am GREAT with children because I love humans of all sizes. I learn REALLY quickly and love to please, especially in response to an experienced, calm, assertive pack leader that I respect. name: Mesmerizing LITTLE Mr Mignon ~ Schnorkie
description:
PLEASE NOTE: Mignon is living happily in foster and will ONLY be available at our Simply Diego's adoption event on 9/21. Please see below for details.

Hi, I'm Mignon, so named because I'm known to be such a TENDER little DELICACY with my ânuttyâ facial expressions, sweet personality, flamboyant style and AMAZING character ! I'm a 2 year old male Schnorkie (Yep, it's a real breed now folks! Google: Schnauzer / Yorkie blend ~ who knew !?!) who's really a DARLING, super SMART, inquisitive,GENTLE, funny LITTLE bundle of PURE JOY ! I am ever so slightly shy at first from all the many rapid changes in my short life but warm up to everyone instantly if you simply give me two seconds and then I learn new things immediately cause I'm super, SUPER SMART and VERY WILLING to please! Once I'm comfortable, I literally prance everywhere I go, out to politely strut my stuff for all my many admirers who say I'm sooooooo cute! To top that, I'm working diligently on my housebreaking skills, already crate trained and even sits and/or PAWS for treats and attention ! My rescue friends promise I'll easily get the perfect home everyone agrees that I TRULY deserve ~ bless their hearts for lovin me so much. At only 18 pounds and 12 inches tall (at the withers), some folks would consider me TINY but my heart is as BIG as ALL outdoors and I'm EASY to take anywhere YOU'D like to go ~ I promise to shower YOU with love and a life time of devotion ! Iâm just a lovable, LITTLE, very HAPPY house/lap dog who would soooooo love to have my very own human(s) again :) I âpromiseâ to be the BESTEST BOY ~ would YOU be MY new fur-ever friends (?!?) I would love to hang out with YOU !!!

Rags to Riches w AMAZING Manners & PURE Devotion = A+++

name: Tantilizing Ms Topanga
description:
Hi there, my name's Topanga and I'm said to be a GORGEOUS 18 month old, spayed female American Staffordshire Terrier who's known to be a TOTAL house dog! Just a LOVABLE little clown that ADORES hugs and frolicking with my human AND canine friends, especially my BFF and playmate, Tyris the English Mastiff, cause that stunning hunk of 200 lb love keeps me entertained all day long! We also volunteer our combined services to help Mare here in rescue by anchoring the alpha yard and thus setting the âtoneâ (ie, sterling example) for all the other dogs here in house. That's the a HIGHEST compliment possible here and one we give every effort to live up to! If you like walks, hiking or running, Iâm your girl ~ I can be the the consummate athlete OR a charming couch potato to echo YOUR choice for the day ! I enjoy all my friends at our multi dog indoor foster home and am SUPER NICE to everyone I meet ~ it always pays to be a Lady! I have a STABLE, even temperament; am CALM, intelligent, EASY to train, affectionate, extremely GENTLE and very well behaved indoors knowing thatâs the place to be kicked back. Iâm a very SWEET girl whoâs SUPER well socialized, housebroken, crate trained and I even sit nicely for treats (immediately AND without being asked, thank you very much :) I loooooove to play with toys and especially enjoy car rides and playing in the water! I have a heart of gold, and am GREAT with children because I love humans of ALL sizes. I learn REALLY quickly and love to please, especially in response to an experienced, calm, assertive pack leader that I respect. My foster Mom says Iâm the PERFECT companion because I'm BRILLIANT, live to please my human(s) and have a heart as BIG as all outdoors !!!

Loads of Special Character in this DARLING Gorgeous Girl !

Why wait??? Simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private \"By Appointment Only\" showing at our \"Adoptions in the Park\" !!! Or contact us via our petabulls.com/adopt website. PLEASE include YOUR phone number on all inquiries as we are RARELY around the computer these days :) Open 10 am to 6 pm Wens thru Mon. Closed Tuesdays.

name: Spectacular LIL Ms Scampi
description:
Hi there, I'm called Scampi, so named for my âwhole heartedâ facial expressions, sweet flamboyant confidence, self-assured style and AMAZING character ! I'm a 6 month old female Miniature Schnauzer / Terrier blend who's especially SWEET and LOADS of laughter cause I looooove life and everyone in it. âNEVER met a stranger and EVERYONE'S my friend 'cause the world is MY oyster and life is GOODâ ~ that's me, Me, ME ! I'm a GOOD GIRL and working diligently to learn my manners so that I'll grow into the canine ambassador my rescue friends describe ~ YAY ! I'm an inquisitive, adventurous little character who's thrilled that there's a whole world of new things to learn and explore right in my very own yard! I literally prance out everywhere I go, to politely strut my stuff for all my many admirers who say I'm sooooooo cute! My rescue friends promise me that I'll easily get the perfect home everyone agrees that I so TRULY deserve ~ bless their hearts for lovin me so much. I'm nearly full grown at 23 lbs and 12 inches tall (at the withers) so some people might consider me LITTLE but my heart is as BIG as ALL outdoors and I'm EASY to take anywhere YOU'D like to go !!! Flawlessly house, car, crate and leash trained since I've lived in an indoor home my entire life, I dearly love other dogs and all humans, big AND small and I do very well with cats and children too !!! Soon-to-be-altered, completely up to date on ALL my vaccinations, chipped and VERY sweet ~ do YOU need a cuddle partner ??? Iâm just a lovable little CLOWN who'll keep you laughing for a life time of love, who would soooooo love to have my very own human(s) again :) I âpromiseâ to be the BESTEST BABY ~ won't YOU teach me some tricks (?!?) I would love to hang out with YOU !!!

Good Behavior, GREAT Personality, WICKED Smart !

Why wait??? Simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private \"By Appointment Only\" showing at our \"Adoptions in the Park\" !!! Or contact us via our petabulls.com/adopt website. PLEASE include YOUR phone number on all inquiries as we are RARELY around the computer these days :) Open 10 am to 6 pm Wens thru Mon. Closed Tuesdays.

name: Lovely Ms Leta Lestrange
description:
Hello there, my nameâs Leta Lestrange cause Mare's insistent on naming all her Rotties for Harry Potter characters but my rescue friends call me Leta cause I'm so SWEET, easy and GENTLE ! Iâm a pure bred, 3 year old spayed female Rottweiler who would love to be YOUR house dog âcause Iâm completely trustworthy (no furniture chewing or accidents !!) and I looooove to spend time anywhere with my people! I was a happy, one owner girl who's human fell too ill to continue caring for me (must have been really bad since I require nothing more than food or potty breaks so I really, REALLY worried about my human for awhile !!!), then I found myself at an overcrowded rural shelter where the nice folks worked really hard to get me comfortable and into rescue where I'm currently hanging out peacefully with my son, Lord Voldemort, a gorgeous young buck who makes me feel all young and pretty again, he's such a sweetheart and I am sooooooo proud of that boy! I'm ever so slightly shy at first from all the many rapid changes in my short life but warm up to everyone instantly if you simply give me two seconds and then I learn new things immediately cause I'm super SMART and VERY WILLING to please; I'm amazingly devoted to my people! Just look into my eyes ~ I want so much to be loved! Iâm AMAZING with other dogs and loooove to learn so teach me some tricks! In return for your kindness, I promise to shower you with kisses and tons of love and devotion. Mare says Iâm super, SUPER sweet, the PERFECT gracious Lady AND the most DEVOTED dog sheâs ever had the pleasure to meet ~ sheâs sure YOUâll think so too!!!

All that AND More in a ROCK STAR Package !!!

Why wait??? Simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private \"By Appointment Only\" showing at our \"Adoptions in the Park\" !!! Or contact us via our petabulls.com/adopt website. name: Lovable Lord Voldemort
description:
Hi there, my name's Lord Voldemort 'cause I'm such a HAPPY character (and NOT a villain) so since Mare names all her Rotties for Harry Potter characters it just kinda fit !!! Don't be fooled by my stoic âbulldogâ looks (that's a joke folks, I'm just mirroring my friends here in rescue...) ~ Iâm really a 2 year old, neutered male Rottweiler who's known to be a really GENTLE, laid back, CALM, âMomma's (or Daddy's) boyâ that loves to snuggle or just lay quietly and content at your feet enjoying my bone. An EASY GOING, full grown fairly large sized, love~a~bull clown that's into focusing on and frolicking with my human and canine friends. SBM looking for the cuddly type, that's me, Me, ME!!! I have a super STABLE, even temperament so I'm CALM, quiet, HIGHLY INTELLIGENT, easy to train, SUPER affectionate, extremely GENTLE and very well behaved indoors knowing that's the place to be kicked back. Iâm a TOTAL house dog and a very SWEET boy whoâs super socialized, housebroken, crate trained and I even sit nicely for treats. In fact, until just recently I've enjoyed living in an indoor home my entire life, but no hard feelings though, life is GOOD these days with people who appreciate what a stellar personality and LOYAL friend I truly am! I make sure to announce the arrival of any strangers with a short series of alarm barks designed to alert you to unknown visitors but Iâm especially good with people ~ even the UPS man! My foster mom, Mare herself, says I'm the absolute âBESTEST BOYâ and calls me her SPECIAL âambassador,â guess that means Iâm a GOOD BOY! I have a heart of gold and learn really quickly 'cause I love to please my human(s), especially in response to an experienced, calm, assertive pack leader that I respect. She says I'm the PERFECT companion because I'm such a sweetie and have a heart as big as all outdoors! (I love her too :) ) Iâd really like to have a special person(s) of my very own, one whoâll fulfill my dream of having a pack leader, teach me new things and maybe even take me to classes where I can show off my talents ~ I promise to shower YOU with love and a life time of devotion in return!

Darling SWEET Looooooves Everyone He Meets w/ LOADS of Character !!!

Why wait??? Simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private \"By Appointment Only\" showing at our \"Adoptions in the Park\" !!! Or contact us via our petabulls.com/adopt website. PLEASE include YOUR phone number on all inquiries as we are RARELY around the computer these days :) Open 10 am to 6 pm Wens thru Mon. Closed Tuesdays.

I have a super STABLE, even temperament so I'm CALM, quiet, HIGHLY INTELLIGENT, easy to train, SUPER affectionate, extremely GENTLE and very well behaved indoors knowing that's the place to be kicked back. Iâm a TOTAL house dog and a very SWEET boy whoâs super socialized, housebroken, crate trained and I even sit nicely for treats. In fact, until just recently I've enjoyed living in an indoor home my entire life, but no hard feelings though, life is GOOD these days with people who appreciate what a stellar personality and LOYAL friend I truly am! I make sure to announce the arrival of any strangers with a short series of alarm barks designed to alert you to unknown visitors but Iâm especially good with people ~ even the UPS man! My foster mom, Mare herself, says I'm the absolute âBESTEST BOYâ and calls me her SPECIAL âambassador,â guess that means Iâm a GOOD BOY! I have a heart of gold and learn really quickly 'cause I love to please my human(s), especially in response to an experienced, calm, assertive pack leader that I respect. She says I'm the PERFECT companion because I'm such a sweetie and have a heart as big as all outdoors! (I love her too :) ) Iâd really like to have a special person(s) of my very own, one whoâll fulfill my dream of having a pack leader, teach me new things and maybe even take me to classes where I can show off my talents ~ I promise to shower YOU with love and a life time of devotion in return!

Darling SWEET Looooooves Everyone He Meets w/ LOADS of Character !!!

Why wait??? Simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private \"By Appointment Only\" showing at our \"Adoptions in the Park\" !!! Or contact us via our petabulls.com/adopt website. PLEASE include YOUR phone number on all inquiries as we are RARELY around the computer these days :) Open 10 am to 6 pm Wens thru Mon. Closed Tuesdays.

name: Charming Mr Cesare
description:
Hi, my name's Cesare ~ yep, Yep, YEP, dat's ME, da BEST little Nobleman apprentice in training around these parts (grins) !!! I'm a 2 year old neutered male Great Pyrenees / White Shepherd blend who's sending out a special shout of THANKS to our rescue for taking me in and making my life soooooooo MUCH better, something for which I am VERY grateful ! In return, I work very hard to learn and then my mind manners, doing everything they ask after only being shown ONCE cause I truly appreciate the praise ~ and the treats ~ I get in return. Iâm just a QUIET but SWEET, gentle, LOVABLE clown that adores hugs and frolicking with my human and canine friends !!! If you like walks, hiking and/or (eventually) running, then Iâm YOUR BOY ~ the CONSUMMATE ATHLETE who also enjoys couch surfing when you're not âin the moodâ to play outdoors! I enjoy all my friends at our multi dog indoor foster home and am SUPER NICE to everyone I meet, it always pays to be gracious and FRIENDLY. I have a stable, CALM, even temperament, and I'm very INTELLIGENT, so I'm super EASY to train, AFFECTIONATE, loads of FUN and very well behaved indoors knowing thatâs the place to be kicked back. Iâm a SUPER SWEET guy whoâs super socialized, housebroken, crate trained and I even sit nicely for treats (immediately AND without being asked, thank you very much:). I have a heart of gold, and am FABULOUS with children because I love humans of all sizes. I learn REALLY quickly and looooove to please, especially in response to an experienced, calm, assertive pack leader that I respect. Mare says Iâm the PERFECT companion because I have a heart as big as all outdoors and she's sure you'll think so too!

Darling SWEET Dude Looooooves Everyone He Meets !!!

name: Stunning Mr Sholo
description:
Hi there, my name's Sholo and I'm a healthy, HAPPY, super EASY GOING 6 month old neutered male Labrador Retriever who's known to be a FABULOUS playmate for other dogs and will be an athletic person's dream ~ if you like walks, hiking or running, Iâm YOUR guy ~ Iâll be the consummate athlete OR the most CHARMING couch potato to echo YOUR choice for the day ! I'm just a LOVABLE clown that ADORES hugs and spending quality time with my human and canine friends. I enjoy all my friends at our multi dog indoor foster home and am SUPER NICE to everyone I meet ~ it always pays to be a Gentleman so I'm working diligently to perfect that skill as well. I have a STABLE, even temperament; am HAPPY, intelligent, EASY to train, AFFECTIONATE, extremely GENTLE and very well behaved indoors knowing thatâs the place to be kicked back. Iâm a very SWEET boy whoâs SUPER well socialized, housebroken, crate trained and I even sit nicely for treats (immediately AND without being asked, thank you very much :) I loooooove to play with toys and especially enjoy car rides and looooove the water! I have a heart of gold, and am GREAT with children because I absolutely those mini humans. I learn REALLY quickly and love to please, especially in response to an experienced, calm, assertive pack leader that I respect. Mare herself says Iâm a GREAT companion because I'm such a SWEETIE, love to please my human(s) and have a heart as BIG as all outdoors !!! PLUS, I promise to be the BESTEST BOY !!!

Sweet + SUPER Intelligent + HUGE Heart = WOW !!!

name: Cutie Pie Chimei de Chiwee
description:
Hi there, my name's Chimei cause I AM ! Iâm a 1 year old spayed female Chiweenie (Dachshund / Chihuahua blend) who receives RAVE reviews on the BEAUTY of my markings and DELIGHTFUL temperament everywhere we roam cause I'm especially SWEET and LOOOVE to snuggle ~ or just hang out with my people(s)! Some people might consider me SMALL but my heart is as BIG as ALL outdoors and my SPECTACULAR sense of humor with keep you laughing for a lifetime of LOVE !!! House, car, crate and leash trained since I've lived in an indoor home my entire life, I have an AMAZING sense of humor, SUPERBLY well mannered and I DEARLY LOVE other SMALL dogs and ALL humans (big AND small) plus I do very well with cats too but I especially looooove those hooman children !!! Iâm just a lovable, VERY laid back, CALM, quiet, GENTLE house/lap dog who would soooooo love to have my very own human family to love. Completely up to date on ALL my age appropriate vaccinations and VERY sweet ~ I promise to shower YOU with love and a life time of devotion ! I'm house, car, crate and leash ready, so from CUDDLY to CLOWN, my rescue friends claim I have it ALL !  Iâm just a lovable, LITTLE, very HAPPY house/lap dog who would soooooo love to have my very own human(s) again :) I âpromiseâ to be the BESTEST GIRL ~ would YOU be MY new fur-ever friends (?!?) I would love to hang out with YOU !!!  WoHoo !!!

Thoughtful, BRIGHT, Sweet, Cuddly LITTLE Girl full of FUN !!!

Why wait??? Simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private \"By Appointment Only\" showing at our \"Adoptions in the Park\" !!! Or contact us via our petabulls.com/adopt website. name: The Vivacious Velvet Angel
description:
Hi there, my rescue friends named me Velvet Angel, cause they say I AM ! Can you guess why ??? They say I'm a SPECTACULAR (awwww) 18 month old, spayed female American Pitbull Terrier (APBT) who's personality even outshines her looks AND I'm known to be a TOTAL house dog! Don't be fooled by my dignified facial expression though, cameras are VERY rude human inventions that most of MY species absolutely deplore... I'm truly just a LOVABLE clown that ADORES hugs and frolicking with my human and canine friends. If you like walks, hiking or touring around town, Iâm your girl ~ I can be the the consummate athlete OR charming couch potato to echo YOUR choice for the day ! I enjoy my many friends at our multi dog indoor foster home and am SUPER NICE to everyone I meet ~ it always pays to be a LADY. I have a STABLE, even temperament; am CALM, intelligent, EASY to train, affectionate, extremely GENTLE and very well behaved indoors knowing thatâs the place to be kicked back. Iâm a very SWEET girl whoâs SUPER well socialized, housebroken, crate trained and I even sit nicely for treats (immediately AND without being asked, thank you very much.) I loooooove to play with toys and especially enjoy car rides and playing in the water! But my FAVORITE thing is children ~ I absolutely adore those midget hoomans and make the BEST NANNY dog EVER !!!I have a heart of gold, learn REALLY quickly and love to please, especially in response to an experienced, calm, assertive pack leader that I respect. My foster Mom says Iâm the PERFECT companion because I'm BRILLIANT, live to please my human(s) and have a heart as BIG as all outdoors !!!

Easy girl who's NEVER Met a Stranger, Loves Everyone, Especially Children !!!

Why wait??? Simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private \"By Appointment Only\" showing at our \"Adoptions in the Park\" !!! Or contact us via our petabulls.com/adopt website. PLEASE include YOUR phone number on all inquiries as we are RARELY around the computer these days :) Open 10 am to 6 pm Wens thru Mon. Closed Tuesdays.

name: Beguling Mr Baltazar ~ American Bully
description:
Hi there, my name's Baltazar but I'm often called âBaltiâ for my SILLY sweet lil personality... I'm an 2 year old neutered male American Bully (APBT with LOTS of Bulldog back blood) ~ a true âItty Bitty Pocket Pittyâ who's just a HAPPY lil guy, BRIGHT and CHEERFUL is what I'm all about 'cause I want sooooo VERY much to find a nice family who will love me and be my fur-ever home! Some people consider me âSPECIALâ with my GORGEOUS, sleek, shiny blue fur but my rescue friends assure me that MY personality truly SHINES ! With just a smidgen of TLC and training from Mare and her friends, Iâve blossomed into the DARLING LITTLE CLOWN they knew was lurking inside. I'll do just about ANY thing to please you and steal your heart because I absolutely thrive on positive praise and affection :) Hey folks, life is GOOD these days and that's something I truly appreciate! I'm said to be a HAPPY, healthy, HYSTERICALLY FUNNY, outgoing, super (SUPER) smart, confident and totally ready to find my forever home! Iâm a very FRIENDLY boy who loves to run and play outside and I'm well behaved indoors, settling in nicely at your feet so we can read, nap or watch movies. My goofy facial expressions and quirkie little run (from the sheer JOY of being alive) keep everyone rolling in laughter, and I do LOVE to entertain! I also love long walks, hikes, jogging with my favorite human, or just about anything you care to do that lets us spend time together. I'm completely house, crate, car and even leash trained ~ putting my head through the loop and walking out on lead to go off for another adventure! Iâd really like to live the family lifestyle with a special person(s) of my very own, humans whoâll love me, teach me new things and maybe even take me to classes where I can show off my talents ~ I promise to shower YOU with love and a life time of devotion in return!

HUGE Heart + Good Manners = A True Treasure !!!

Why wait??? Simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private \"By Appointment Only\" showing at our \"Adoptions in the Park\" !!! Or contact us via our petabulls.com/adopt website. PLEASE include YOUR phone number on all inquiries as we are RARELY around the computer these days :) Open 10 am to 6 pm Wens thru Mon. Closed Tuesdays.

name: Darling Ms DoraCora
description:
Hi there, my name's DoraCora and I'm a 2 year old, spayed female Australian Cattle Dog genes thrown in here for good measure... lol. I'm known to be a FABULOUS playmate for other dogs; helping Mare here in rescue by stabilizing THREE young males and teaching them the ropes... Hey, someone's gotta to teach those boys their social skills and manners ! (hehe) I'm also an athletic person's dream ~ you like walks, hiking or running, Iâm your girl ~ I can be the the consummate athlete OR charming couch potato to echo YOUR choice for the day ! I'm just a sweet, LOVABLE clown that ADORES hugs and spending quality time with my human and canine friends. I enjoy all my friends at our multi dog indoor foster home and am SUPER NICE to everyone I meet ~ it always pays to be a Lady so I've worked diligently to learn that skill as well. I have a STABLE, even temperament; am HAPPY, intelligent, EASY to train, AFFECTIONATE, extremely GENTLE and very well behaved indoors knowing thatâs the place to be kicked back. Iâm a very SWEET girl whoâs SUPER well socialized, housebroken, crate trained and I even sit nicely for treats (immediately AND without being asked, thank you very much :) I loooooove to play with toys and especially enjoy car rides and looooove playing in the water! I have a heart of gold, and am GREAT with children because I love humans of all sizes. I learn REALLY quickly and love to please, especially in response to an experienced, calm, assertive pack leader that I respect. My foster Mom says Iâm a GREAT companion because I'm such a SWEETIE, love to please my human(s) and have a heart as BIG as all outdoors !!!

Sweet Personality, Loooves to Play, DARLING Soul !!!

name: Darling Ms DoraCora
description:
Hi there, my name's DoraCora and I'm a 2 year old, spayed female Australian Cattle Dog genes thrown in here for good measure... lol. I'm known to be a FABULOUS playmate for other dogs; helping Mare here in rescue by stabilizing THREE young males and teaching them the ropes... Hey, someone's gotta to teach those boys their social skills and manners ! (hehe) I'm also an athletic person's dream ~ you like walks, hiking or running, Iâm your girl ~ I can be the the consummate athlete OR charming couch potato to echo YOUR choice for the day ! I'm just a sweet, LOVABLE clown that ADORES hugs and spending quality time with my human and canine friends. I enjoy all my friends at our multi dog indoor foster home and am SUPER NICE to everyone I meet ~ it always pays to be a Lady so I've worked diligently to learn that skill as well. I have a STABLE, even temperament; am HAPPY, intelligent, EASY to train, AFFECTIONATE, extremely GENTLE and very well behaved indoors knowing thatâs the place to be kicked back. Iâm a very SWEET girl whoâs SUPER well socialized, housebroken, crate trained and I even sit nicely for treats (immediately AND without being asked, thank you very much :) I loooooove to play with toys and especially enjoy car rides and looooove playing in the water! I have a heart of gold, and am GREAT with children because I love humans of all sizes. I learn REALLY quickly and love to please, especially in response to an experienced, calm, assertive pack leader that I respect. My foster Mom says Iâm a GREAT companion because I'm such a SWEETIE, love to please my human(s) and have a heart as BIG as all outdoors !!!

Sweet Personality, Loooves to Play, DARLING Soul !!!

name: Pretty Ms Padme Pia de Presa Canario
description:
Hello there my lovies, my name is Padme Pia or, as my Mare calls me ~ MY PRETTY! I'm a LOVELY 3 year old, pure bred, spayed female Presa Canario (Canary Island Mastiff) who is BEYOND well mannered and house trained ~ settling nicely at your feet to keep YOU company is MY favorite pass time :) Mare says Iâm a SWEET, lovable, furry HUG on four legs and I DO loooove to gently hug my hoomans! If you prize loyalty, Iâm your girl ~ Iâll stick by your side through thick and thin âcause Iâm the most devoted friend youâll ever encounter! I really enjoy spending time with my humans and canine friends here in our multi dog foster home and am super nice to everyone I meet. Some of the dogs can be a little intimidated by my size but my especially good social skills, extremely gentle nature and impeccable manners usually wins them over, it always pays to be a Gracious Lady. Typical of the original Mastiff breedings, I have a STABLE, even temperament, am CALM, intelligent, easy to train, AFFECTIONATE, extremely GENTLE and very WELL BEHAVED indoors knowing thatâs the place to be kicked back. Iâm a very sweet girl whoâs super socialized, housebroken, crate trained and I even sit nicely for treats (immediately AND without being asked, thank you very much :). I love to play with my people and especially enjoy car rides, loading up instantly in anticipation of the next adventure ~ perfect place for a nap! I have a heart of gold, and am super GOOD WITH CHILDREN because I love humans of all sizes and absolutely adore the little munchkins! I learn really quickly and love to please, especially in response to an experienced, calm, assertive pack leader that I respect. Mare says Iâm the PERFECT companion and breed ambassador because I have a heart as big as all outdoors ~ just call her, Iâd loooooove to meet YOU too!!!

Absolutely AMAZING Lady ~ Best of the BEST !!!

Why wait??? Simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private \"By Appointment Only\" showing at our \"Adoptions in the Park\" !!! Or contact us via our petabulls.com/adopt website. PLEASE include YOUR phone number on all inquiries as we are RARELY around the computer these days :) Open 10 am to 6 pm Wens thru Mon. Closed Tuesdays.

Come meet the PACK at our Simply Diego's (formerly Wild Pet Food Plus) Pet Adoption event Saturday, Sept 21st, from 12 noon to 5pm - 3301 Menaul Blvd NE Suite 10, Albuquerque, NM 87107. We hope to see YOU there !!!

OR join the entire Pet-A-Bulls PACK at the national Coldwell Banker Pet Adoption event Saturday, Sept 28th, from 11am to 3pm - 6767 Academy Rd NE, Albuquerque, NM 87109. We hope to see YOU there !!!

name: Remarkable Mr Win
description:
Hello there, dear humans. My rescue friends named me Windsor, saying I'm the perfectly ELEGANT Gentleman but YOU may call me Win as I much prefer the more suggestive abbreviated version. (We are all what we think. Thought to reality you know !) Iâm a 4 year old American Staffordshire Terrier who is known to be a VERY CALM, well-mannered, GENTLE CLOWN who enjoys a good snuggle and the consummate house dog who knows how to behave like a gentleman indoors OR out. I was well socialized from infancy and thus I am known to be FABULOUS with children and other dogs as I love to please my people. My foster Mother and host, Mare herself, states that I would easily make an exceptional town house (or condo) companion because I am so very relaxed indoors! Fortune truly smiled upon me when I arrived at her home as she affords special privileges to me, saying Iâm so HIGHLY INTELLIGENT, a REMARKABLE boy and one of the easiest dogs sheâs ever seenâ¦ In truth, I gladly do anything she asks for all the extra hugs and kisses that good behavior gains me !!! Iâve heard that laps are for sissies though so Iâll gently lay my head on your leg or lean into your arms for a big hug, and itâs superb to simply recline at your feet while entertaining myself with a favorite bone. I know to keep my âfour on the floor,â as I would never dream of jumping on a human and exhibit advanced behavioral skills with executing my âsit,â âstay,â âwait,â âload up,â âleave itâ and âoffâ commands while being completely house, crate, car and even leash trained ~ putting my head through the loop and stepping nicely out on lead to accompany you for yet another adventure! There are a multitude of other dogs here with which I am highly socialized and even made friends with nearly everyone in the group. I clearly relish the company of a pleasant female canine companion, such as my current Lady love, Ms Megan, with whom I treasure spending my days. I do know to announce the arrival of strangers though I am especially good with people ~ and particularly those miniature humans you people refer to as children, darling creatures those. I am allowed to sleep in a nice comfortable bed without a crate and I especially enjoy touring in the automobiles, even for lengthy trips. Mare deems me her special âbreed ambassador,â which apparently means that I am an EXCEPTIONAL BOY! I do long to have a special person(s) of my very own though, one who will teach me new things and maybe even take me to classes where I can show off my talents ~ I solemnly promise to shower YOU with love and a life time of devotion in return!

The PERFECT, Well Mannered Gentleman !!! A+++

Why wait??? Simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private \"By Appointment Only\" showing at our \"Adoptions in the Park\" !!! Or contact us via our petabulls.com/adopt website. PLEASE include YOUR phone number on all inquiries as we are RARELY around the computer these days :) Open 10 am to 6 pm Wens thru Mon. Closed Tuesdays.

Come meet the PACK at our Simply Diego's (formerly Wild Pet Food Plus) Pet Adoption event Saturday, Sept 21st, from 12 noon to 5pm - 3301 Menaul Blvd NE Suite 10, Albuquerque, NM 87107. We hope to see YOU there !!!

OR join the entire Pet-A-Bulls PACK at the national Coldwell Banker Pet Adoption event Saturday, Sept 28th, from 11am to 3pm - 6767 Academy Rd NE, Albuquerque, NM 87109. We hope to see YOU there !!!

name: Magnificent Ms Megan ~ American Bully
description:
Hi there, my name's Megan but everyone calls me Meg 'cause I'm the true \"HOT MOMMA\" in town! Iâm a pure bred, 4 year old, spayed female American Bully (Amstaff with LOTS of Bulldog back blood) who's REALLY gentle AND patient ! I'm just a EASY GOING, calm, KIND-HEARTED soul who loves to hang out with my humans and the consummate house dog who knows how to behave like a true LADY, both indoors AND out! Typical of the original Bully breedings, I have a STABLE, even temperament so I'm CALM, highly INTELLIGENT, easy to train, AFFECTIONATE, extremely GENTLE and very WELL BEHAVED indoors knowing thatâs the place to be kicked back. So Iâm known to be a super sweet girl who is amazingly well socialized, housebroken, crate trained (though I certainly don't need one) and even sit for treats and/or attention (automatically and without being asked, thank you very much). I love to lay at your feet and play with my bone(s) or favorite toys and especially enjoy car rides where I sit nicely to take in the scenery! I have a heart of gold, learn really quickly and love to please my people. There's also a LOT of other dogs here so I'm highly socialized so I've even made peace with Ms Sadie, the fairly bossy high Priestess of Bulldogs on this ranch and thoroughly enjoy spending my time and life with my devoted canine companion, the most handsome, Mr Win, who is ever so debonair with his dapper tuxedo coat! Mare says Iâm the PERFECT breed ambassador, a GREAT companion and friend because I have a LOVELY disposition and a heart as big as all outdoors! Iâm just happy sheâs so pleased with me, but then Iâm a happy kinda gal anyway ~ serene and cheerful is what Iâm all about! I'm SUPER SMART, love to learn new things and do my utmost to be the BESTEST GIRL you'll ever meet because I'm absolutely DEVOTED to pleasing my human(s). Iâm looking for a special person(s) or a family of my own so I can stick by your side through thick and thin âcause Iâm the most LOYAL friend youâll ever encounter!

GORGEOUS LOOKS + STELLAR PERSONALITY = A VERY SPECIAL FIND !

Why wait??? Simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private \"By Appointment Only\" showing at our \"Adoptions in the Park\" !!! Or contact us via our petabulls.com/adopt website. PLEASE include YOUR phone number on all inquiries as we are RARELY around the computer these days :) Open 10 am to 6 pm Wens thru Mon. Closed Tuesdays.

Come meet the PACK at our Simply Diego's (formerly Wild Pet Food Plus) Pet Adoption event Saturday, Sept 21st, from 12 noon to 5pm - 3301 Menaul Blvd NE Suite 10, Albuquerque, NM 87107. We hope to see YOU there !!!

name: Oscar
description:
You can fill out an adoption application online on our official website.All of the animals posted on our site have been temperament tested. While not all are in the immediate area, once we have processed and approved your application, we will move the dog to our adoptive area for you to meet, greet and hopefully adopt. Sometimes we will have more than one application on a dog. That does not mean it automatically goes to another family but you should be aware of the fact that until you are approved and set up for the meet/greet.. the dog could get adopted by another applicant.NOTE- OSCAR IS LISTED AS A COURTESY FOR ANOTHER RESCUE ORGANIZATION. PLEASE SEE CONTACT INFO BELOW. Oscar is very good with people. He has only met other dogs through a fence so he will be slowly introduced to other dogs soon to get a better idea of how he does with them. He barks at them initially and then calms down but further dog testing will be needed after he is neutered. Oscar is a sweet boy that loves car rides and wants a family to call his own. He is unusually beautiful and appears to have been well taken care of. Oscar is located in Allegheny County, MD.
If you are interested in adopting Oscar, please contact:Missy MorganPhone: 240-979-7381

name: Raphael
description: Rachael is a very sweet fella that was brought in as a stray from the Altoona City area. If his owners don't come for him, he will need a new family to love him forever. Please ask to visit with this sweet boy to see if he's a good match for you!

name: MEATBALL
description:
MEATBALL is a 3-1/2 month old Great Pyrenees mix, one of a litter of 11. Mom was a Great Pyrenees, Dad was possibly an Anatolian Shepherd.  Rescued from a hoarding case, this pup is now looking for a forever home.  Lovable and gentle, this will be a big dog when fully grown.  Weight is already around 40 lbs!  Available by approved application. We prefer to adopt our dogs to homes within a 125 mile radius, but other applicants will be considered.

Adoption fee is $300 and includes age appropriate shots, spay/neuter and microchip. If you are interested in adopting MEATBALL, please fill out an adoption application.  Please email us at alldogscfh@gmail.com with any questions or put your application in at http://www.alldogscomefromheaven.com/adoption-application.php

ADCFH has adoption events weekly at Eastgate Petsmart on Saturdays from 11-4 or by appointment at our shelter in Amelia, OH.  All dogs are spayed or neutered and up to date with vaccines.  Adoption fees are: $300 for puppies (under 6 months); $275 young dogs (6 months to 1 year); $250 adults (1 year and older); and $200 senior dogs (8 years and older).

Adoption fee is $300 and includes age appropriate shots, spay/neuter and microchip. If you are interested in adopting LOKI, please fill out an adoption application.  Please email us at alldogscfh@gmail.com with any questions or put your application in at http://www.alldogscomefromheaven.com/adoption-application.php

Adoption fees are: $300 for puppies (under 6 months); $275 young dogs (6 months to 1 year); $250 adults (1 year and older); and $200 senior dogs (8 years and older).

name: Faith
description:
Hello, My name is Faith. I am an energetic, talkative, funny Siberian Husky girl looking for my forever home.  I am looking for a home that has experience in huskies, that is very energetic and that will keep up with my training.

My story:

I was brought here from Animal control down by Detroit MI. I was adopted once from there but brought back due to some pretty sever issues that landed me on what is called the Euthanization list. I am not sure what that means, all I know is that I have heard that it  isn't a good thing. The person at animal control along with another individual did not feel I should be euthanized. They found this lady at the rescue I am at now, and the rest is history.
       When I arrived here, I had absolutely NO training.  I also had the \"MINE\" complex, meaning what is mine is mine, what is yours is mine and I owned everything. I certainly felt I did not need to do anything that was asked of me.  I knew a few basic commands but I wouldnt do them unless there was something in it for me. Yes, some of this is husky behavior, however, mine was to the extreme. Should anyone have tried to take something from me that I felt was mine ( and everything was mine) I would behave badly and sometimes bite them. HOWEVER,
       After a year of rehabilitation, leadership, training and desensitization with things I am a very well rounded girl. I know my basic commands such as, sit, wait, leave it, down, off, stay, bring it and shake. My foster mommy said I never had any direction in my life or leadership causing me to  act out badly and develop the \"mine\" complex to the extreme. 
        My foster mommy can now place her hand into my food dish with food and I will eat around her hand ( I also had issues with being possessive over my food while in the dish). She can safely take things out of my mouth like toys, bones and anything else I decide to put into it that she needs to fish out (yup, now that  is my NORMAL husky behavior showing up). She has desensitized, me from everything she can think of, given me direction, training and leadership. 
        I am playful, I love to play fetch although, there are times when the bring the toy back consists of me bringing the toy to my foster mom , me waiting for her to get close and taking off with the toy. Its a fun game!
        I like to play with other dogs but I can be overbearing and dominant with some dogs. I do best with other male dogs but I can do well  with other females with proper introductions. NO CATS or small animals (chickens etc)  however,  DO have a very high prey drive! 
        I like to go for car rides, and I ride very well in a vehicle . I walk well on the leash now with minimal corrections unless I see something that gets me really excited. I know my basic commands such as sit, stay, down, off, leave it, shake and bring it (still working on that!). I also am a talker and most of the time I never shut up! 
        If you would like to learn even more about me please contact my foster mommy through this site! Im sure she will talk forever about me!  

You can also apply to meet me at www.fewstepsfromhome.com and follow the link to the meet and greet/pre-adoption application.

Hope to meet you soon! oh, bring treats! Im VERY treat motivated!! 

PS. no young kids please

name: Tucker
description:
Tucker is in a foster home with his sister Leia. There are also cats in their foster home for any adopters that do have a kitty, they are already introduced!

Tucker came with the litter of 3mo olds that were pulled by us from a more remote shelter in Arizona. He came with 18 other huskies that were all saved from the same neglectful home. Our rescue was able to pull 12 of them. All of the dogs in this litter do great with other dogs, but some are a little more skittish with people at first. They seem to warm up and become very snuggly and loving for the most part, but definitely would benefit from longterm socialization work.

According to his foster, Tucker is completely potty trained in their home (new changes like a home move can sometimes back this process up a little, so as with all puppies, some patience may be required). The fosters are working on crate-training still, as well as taking treats more gently â Tucker has been showing some good progress with this. Tucker is the more snuggly, loving dog of the two puppies in the foster home. He also loves to play with other dogs!

Fill out an application (note our response time may be 1-2week as we consider applicants and the puppies still need a couple weeks to be ready for their forever homes): http://azhuskyrescue.com/adoption-application/

name: Gunner
description:
Gunner came with the litter of 3mo olds that were pulled by us from a more remote shelter in Arizona. He came with 18 other huskies that were all saved from the same neglectful home. Our rescue was able to pull 12 of them. All of the dogs in this litter do great with other dogs, but some are a little more skittish with people at first. They seem to warm up and become very snuggly and loving for the most part, but definitely would benefit from longterm socialization work.

Gunner is a very playful active little guy. He is always ready to go anywhere and just loves being around people and other dogs. So far gunner has enjoyed camping, hiking, 4wheeling and nightly walks with his foster brothers. Gunner has been great in the crate while we are at work. Gunner will get into anything so you will need to keep your eyes on him. He seems to have a stubborn personality so not getting him to chew on things or potty training has been rough but he seems to be getting better. This little guy needs someone who loves being active and loves being on the go. He seems to love kids and especially other dogs.

Fill out an application (note our response time may be 1-2week as we consider applicants and the puppies still need a couple weeks to be ready for their forever homes): http://azhuskyrescue.com/adoption-application/

name: Roman
description: âRomanâ is a 3-4y old MN Rottweiler Mix that is still looking for his forever home. He is a giant goofball and enjoys destroying squeaky toys and playing with blankets. He likes to go on walks or going to the park but is also okay with laying around the house. Roman can be very pushy with other dogs so weâre recommending he goes as the only dog in the home. He takes a little longer to warm up to men than women but is a total love bug once he gets to know you. Roman came from a pretty rough situation, where he was kept in a kennel much too small for him, outside in the Arizona heat for almost two years. He came to me underweight and with scars around his eyes, ears and nose from all the fly bites. Because of this we are looking for a home that has Rottweiler experience. Roman is kennel trained, house trained and formally trained in obedience. He knows how to walk nicely on a leash, sit and stay, lay down and stay, how to find the heel position and come when called. He comes with three free handling sessions to the new owners to help his transition to his new home go as smoothly as possible. Please donât hesitate to ask any questions. You can fill out an application at http://www.rottenrottie.com under the forms tab.

name: Zulu - Courtesy Post
description:
***THIS IS A COURTESY LISTING.  This dog is not within the ACDR organization. For all information about this dog, you must contact the person listed within the animal description. He/she has been posted as a courtesy to help his/her owner find a new home. You will need to contact them directly. PLEASE do not email ACDR concerning this dog, we do not have further information concerning this dog. ***

Zulu is an older, medium sized cattle dog mix who is affectionate, loyal, hyper-aware and active. She loves to go on walks and hikes with her humans, chew on her Nylabones and rawhide treats, as well as spend time with her fellow dogs and cats. Zulu is very good with children and other animals (she is reluctant to get to know larger dogs, but has so in the past). 

Zulu dislikes loud, sudden noises and busy areas. This tends to lead to excessive barking. She also dislikes being separated from her humans and prefers to hang out with them all the time! 

At the moment, Zulu's current owners live in a very busy neighborhood, on a very busy intersection. The move to this location has taken a toll on Zulu's mental wellbeing and her current humans would love to find a quiet, loving home for her to spend her golden years in! She is spayed and is current on her vaccines. 

Zulu is located in Tucson, Arizona. You may reach her owner at acespino888@gmail.com or (520)440-5575.

name: Wilma
description:
**************email Foster @ ark9ranch@gmail.com for more details************
NOT IN THE SHELTER ~ Fostering in Ward, Ar 501-259-1065

Hi, my name is Wilma! I am a puppy hound of about 4-5 months. My foster momma calls me a happy hound! HEHE and I am. I really love when momma is able to sit with me...gives me hugs and kisses! I love hanging out playing with my sisters and brother, the ranch cats and some of the other dogs. I like meeting new people of all ages and really like when we get to hang out with foster dad while he watches TV

We all came from rural Arkansas...we was pretty hungry and unsettled due to fending for ourselves in the wild! Foster parents helped us right quick by feeding us plenty of good eats, soft beds and lots of toys to play with.

Now I am ready to become your princess and best gal dog friend. At night I lay in my dog bed dreaming of our hikes, swimming, playing fetch and snuggling up to watch Foot Ball! I just need you to love me...like I am gonna love you! Please fill out my application or contact my foster momma for more details

name: Skipper
description:
*********email foster @ ark9ranch@gmail.com for further information*******
NOT IN THE SHELTER ~ Fostering in WARD,AR. 501-259-1065

Hi there! I am Skipper! A 4-5 month old Hound mix from real rural Arkansas! I am one thankful pup for the kind people that scooped up my sisters and I from trying to fend for ourselves! I will tell you I love me some couch cuddles with soft blankets and plenty of belly rubs! Foster momma say's I am doing really well on house manners, yay me!

I would really love some human siblings...play groups...a yard and my humans to take me on hikes. I love to explore and learn new things as my foster mom say's that I am super smart! Just wait until you feel how super soft my giant floppy ears are...they are ready for you to tell me all your secretes!

So what do you say? Am I your next best canine buddy! Packed and ready to make my way home ...to YOU! We have so much time to make up and I have so much to tell you about!

name: Jax
description:
Jax is very loving and sweet young adult who's about one year old and gets along great with other dogs and people. He's of medium energy level, will be a great walking, or hiking companion. His brown eyes will melt your heart when he looks at you. He has a great since of humor as well and thinks he's pretty funny.

Jax comes fully vetted and microchipped. His adoption fee is $175 in Arkansas and $350 in New England (due to transport fees, the adoption fee is higher)

He was rescued from a hoarding sitution in Arkansas and is a very lucky boy to have a chance to start a new life. Will you open your heart and your home to this wonderful boy?

name: Pepper
description: Pepper was spotted with her puppies down an overgrown dirt road by an abandoned log cabin near Piney Creek. She greeted Paw like he was an old friend. She has been hanging out here at Marley's World and recovering from her ordeal. Pepper is a a true testimonial t to the strength and power of a mother overcoming overwhelming odds to save her puppies. She took to home life real easy. Her favorite thing to do these cold winter days is to sit in the big chair and snuggle. Pepper weighs about 30 pounds and gaining. She has been spayed, had all her shots and is current on heartworm prevention. There are no dogs more loving or faithful than these little black cogs from Arkansas. For more information you can talk to Paw at 870-291-0365 or email him at kylepigman@verizon.net. For more information about ICARE or to fill out an application visit us at icare-ark.com.

name: Wooley Bell
description:
Sorry, we can not adopt to MA residents at this time.

This sweet angel was found abandoned in a park. That is how she got her name. Wooley B is a super playful, energetic, loving, and fun girl. She is one year young and is up to date on her vaccinations, spayed, microchipped, and ready for a loving family.

She especially enjoys her stuffed animals and gets along great with other dogs and cats. Very loving nature who follows your every move while you are outside working in the yard. She is going to make someone a very good pet.

Currently, she is located in Arkansas, but transport is available.

name: Coco
description: Coco is a seven year old male located in Arlington VA.  His mats had mats and so he had to be shaved down.  He's a good boy, a little afraid of men but he will come to love you.  He needs a fenced yard because he is active.

name: Roxy
description:
I live in Bernalillo County, New Mexico.

I came from Artesia with my 4 siblings before we were euthanized.

Puppies donât get any sweeter than this little girl. I have the cutest freckles. I am a little shy when first checking out a new person but once the initial hello is made, I love a good cuddle. I canât wait to meet my new family. With the proper introduction, I should be fine with other dogs, cats and respectful children. I am working on my house training.

Since I am a Foster to Adopt you need to be able to meet for one more combo shot and be able to take me to our vet for sterilization, rabies and micro-chip.

FOSTER TO ADOPT

At the time of this posting I am 3 months old.

name: Franklin
description:
Franklin is a happy go lucky mix.  He was rescued from the Artesia shelter at the very last minute.  He got very lucky as a foster home stepped up to take him in.  He is about 4-5 months old (as of 8/24/19).  He is good with dogs and kids even toddlers.  He is very social.  He loves playing with toys, he's a goofy fella.  He is already housebroken.  He is very, very well behaved for a puppy.  He is not destructive, he doesn't chew on things he isn't supposed to.  He can be left alone along with his doggie buddies with access to a dog door  He would do well in a home with another playful dog(s).  He is very smart.  He is just the sweetest awesomest little boy ever.  He is super friendly.

Contact Trish at 505-907-3791 or email pacatrish@yahoo.com

name: Digby
description:
âThe scientists want to collar himâ¦ The crooks want to steal him. Digby -- the biggest howl in the worldâ -- Digby, The Biggest Dog in the World (1973)

Making his way into the ring, from Athens, Ga, weighing 30lbs, two years old, champion of doggie wrestling, cat-friendly, and all around great pup -- Digby! Currently, Digby loves playing with his canine brothers and sisters as well as getting attention from Foster Mom. Stay tuned as we learn more about Digby!




To ensure our dogs are placed in a safe environment, we require a home visit for all adoptions. Because of this, we typically only adopt to homes within 30 minutes of Athens, GA. If you are further away than that and are interested in one of our pups, please still fill out an application and we can discuss your options. Please understand that you would be responsible for all transportation - meeting the dog, picking the dog up to start a trial, returning the dog should he/she not be a good fit, etc.  Please visit our website for more info. (www.athenscaninerescue.com)

name: Britt
description:
Adoption fee: $350

Britt is a 1 year old, black and tan, natural eared female Doberman with a docked tail. She is spayed, up to date on vaccinations, microchipped, and negative for heartworms and intestinal parasites.

Poor Britt came to GDR from a shelter south of Atlanta where she had been taken in along with 2 other Dobermans as a neglect case. When she first arrived in rescue she was incredibly shy and not at all used to the idea of living inside and would desperatly try to stay outside. Luckily she has an amazing and patient foster who slowly eased her into being an inside dog little by little. Now Britt, while still shy, is getting used to indoor luxuries. She loves to play with her foster brother and sister, exploring the yard and chasing each other. She has enjoyed several toys that they've given her and has figured out how to really play but alsoappreciates her quiet time indoors. She is potty trained, but due to her skittish nature has not been introduced to a crate as she has not needed one. She has done well with the other dogs in the home, but will not be adopted to a home with kids or small animals. She has done well with the infant in the home, but because her background is unknown and interactions have been limited, we are not comfotable adopting her to a home with small kids. The best home for Britt would be a quiet home that wants a companion that is playful, but also happy to chill in the house.

If you are interested in adopting Britt, you csn complete an adoption application here on our website.

description:

name: Elle
description:
Hi! I am Elle and I am a 15 wk, 20 plus pounds of energized Great Dane puppy. I was told I was the runt of the litter so I will probably be on the smaller end of size for a Great Dane. I have two speeds- full steam ahead or sound asleep. I am trying to learn manners and know sit and down: I go to daycare to keep my smart little brain growing. I am very good at daycare and play well with others. I can have an aloof personality with strangers so it is going to be very important that I am socialized all the time. I am all baby so I harass and torment the elderly Shih tzu and cats in the house without mercy. So for the sanity of my future family, I probably donât need cats in my new home. I would love fur siblings but they need to be saints with patience beyond measure. I am trying to learn the body language when another dog wants me to stop biting them with my sharp puppy teeth. Sometimes, I am a little slow on the translation so I need a fur sibling that wonât get to upset with me during my learning curve. I am crate trained and doing well on housebreaking when taken outside on a regular basis for potty breaks. I am not ready or old enough to be left at home for 8-9 hrs a day in a crate. I will need someone home often. 
I am going to be big so I think it is in my best interest to go to a home with large dog experience. Cute, undisciplined, puppy antics turn into unmanageable, unwanted behavior when I am 100 lb adult. 
If you want a loving, sweet, smart, funny, high energy, going to be large adult, best friend please complete an application for me

description:
Milly is a very playful dog that is about a year old and weighs about 32 lbs. Sheâs a little shy at first but warms up quickly. She likes to be with people and will always choose to snuggle with you if she can.  Sheâs good walking on a leash, riding in the car and is housetrained. Sheâs great with kids (over 8 years old because she startles with loud noises and sudden movements).  She loves playing with other dogs and would be happy in a home with another dog or as an âonlyâ dog. She enjoys playing in a fenced yard and is very fast. She comes when sheâs called and is learning basic commands. Milly is a very gentle, good-natured dog that is anxious to find her forever home. Apply for her today!

name: Mia
description:
Hi, Iâm Mia! Iâm a 7 year old Scottish Terrier (mostly) and when I say terrier, I mean terrier! Iâm playful, cheerful, active, and energetic. My vertical leap is pretty impressive if I say so myself. I came to Releash as an owner surrender when my family moved to a house where Iâm not allowed to live. Itâs a huge bummer, but my foster mom promised my little girl that sheâd find an amazing family to love me. I love to run and play. Just pick up a leash and Iâm ready to roll! Iâm potty trained but Iâm not sure how to ask to go outside. I use a pee-pad in case of emergency. Before coming to Releash, I made some poor potty choices inside but Iâm pretty sure thatâs behind me. My foster mom says Iâm doing great. Iâll come when you call me, and sometimes when you donât - I don't want to miss anything. I love a good chew but I donât want to share it. I could be okay with a smaller furry sibling, but not someone who thinks theyâre the boss. Iâm perfectly happy to be an âonlyâ dog. I like to be outside, but not by myself so I hope weâll go on lots of walks together. And donât worry â if you forget to pay attention to me, Iâll help you! I'll sleep in your lap and I might roll over right there so you can easily rub my tummy. Iâm generous like that. Iâll also be happy to sleep with you â so you donât get lonely. Iâm so excited to come take care of you! Just let me get my leash and toys and Iâll be ready to go!!!!

name: Ripley
description:
Meet Ripley! If youâre looking for a sweet-as-pie, snuggly, well behaved new best friend then look no further! This little lady loves everything - humans big and small, dogs, cats, balls and is super easy going. Ripley is about 40 pounds, and gets high marks in all areas of the good dog test. Sheâs crate trained, potty trained and responds well to positive reinforcement. She does have quite a bit of energy though, so she would be best suited to a household where she has a fenced in back yard to play in, or someone who has a very active lifestyle and can keep this girl entertained. If youâre a runner this girl is ready to roll! Does she sound like the perfect addition to your family? If so, apply for Ripley today! ???

name: Socks, active & playful family friendly pup!
description: Meet energetic and happiest baby boy- Socks!  Lovable white feet and the biggest ears- Socks is 3 months old and weighs 22lbs.  We expect he will be about 50lbs at full grown. Socks is a very active and loving, a bundle of joy looking for his fun and active forever home. Sockâs mother was pulled from a high kill shelter in Atlanta and gave birth a week later to 8 sweet puppies in foster care with Jillian of Training to the Rescue. His mother is always so super sweet, extra social and was such a good mom.  The pups were all raised in their rescuer, trainer and foster momâs home with lots of other dogs, cats and visits from kids. Socks loves to play, is good on a leash and just such a well-rounded pup! Socks has received much love, attention, socialization and is in excellent health.  Socks has a great start to life!  Socks needs an active home as he is very playful, loves to run and is learning to fetch.  His foster home has his nearly house-trained too!  Socks would love to go to a home with an older dog to play with and learn from. Heâs in foster care with cats, kids and other dogs- even a bunny sibling.  He will need you to continue his training and your adoption includes sessions with trainer Jillian too. His adoption fee is $400 and he is fully vaccinated and micro-chipped- plus his adoption fee includes his neuter. Socks is working on basic commands and is crate-trained.  He loves car rides and will make an excellent exercise and outdoor partner.  For more information on this baby boy or to set up a meet and greet, contact Jillian at trainingtotherescue@gmail.com.  To apply for this playful and most amazing puppy, go to raincityrescue.com/adopt.  Socks will make you so proud and happy every day he is part of your super fun family!

name: Fred, active & social bully boy! Ready for you!
description: Itâs Fred, the best big boy ever! Fred is a happy and healthy 69lbs of love and playfulness! A youthful two-year old, Fred is friendly and outgoing.  Rescued from high kill metro Atlanta, Fred is living with rescuer, foster and trainer Sarah.  Fred is the smartest dog and very eager to please. He wants and needs an equally smart human to keep up with him! Fred knows his basic commands and is very agreeable, friendly and lovable. Fred can get super excited with new people and new dog playmates and might need your help settling him down and learning how to slow down his play with new dogs at first. Fred loves people too.  Fred loves car rides and is good on a leash- he can be a bit pully as heâs a big boy!  Mr. Fred can be calm and quiet in your house too.  Fred would love it if you worked from home! Fred will be a good exercise partner. He enjoys daily walks but doesnât need extensive running or walking.  He enjoys the outdoors and truly loves to play and is an awesome fetcher! Fred knows his basic commands and is house trained, micro-chipped, vaccinated and neutered.  He would love a large yard to play in and for you to continue his training. Fred is crate trained and a good traveler.  Due to his size we suggest a home without toddlers, as Fred could possibly knock over a little one. We suggest no kitties or small dogs as sometimes he doesnât quite know his size! Fred is just the best boy and so lucky to be rescued and canât wait to meet you. Fredâs adoption fee is $200. For questions, meet and greet or for an adoption application email Sarah at trainingtotherescue@gmail.com.  Sarah loves having him at her house, but itâs time for him to meet his forever family!

name: Bruno
description:
Hi guys! My names Bruno and somehow I landed myself in a scary place with lots of cages and other dogs barking. But donât worry, some awesome people got me out of there and now Iâm the happiest pup alive! Iâm about 3 years old and a lot smaller than I look in my pictures and sometimes I like to prove it by sitting in my foster momâs lap! Iâm a chill guy and donât mind hanging out with furry friends canine or feline! I havenât been around kids for extended periods of time but the ones I meet on our walks through the neighborhood are fine with me, just more pets really! I love attention and havenât had any accidents in my foster home! I still have a bunch of energy and would love someone to throw a ball with me and end the night with a cuddle session! Iâm a smart boy and have almost perfected my âsitâ and âdownâ commands too!If you think Iâm the right guy for you, apply with Releash Atlanta!

name: Periwinkle
description:
Have you ever wanted to recreate that cover photo for an outdoors magazine? You know the one with the beagle laying in front of the fire on a plaid dog bed. Well... if you donât mind me also being in your lap part of the time! I am your next family member!!!
Hi! My name is Perry (8 yrs old), and I am in the stage of my life where I am pretty low maintenance! If memory serves me correctly, I have never really been a house dwelling dog. However, I am a quick study and found my favorite places are in someoneâs lap or on the couch. I am crate trained. I am still working on housebreaking when left unattended. 
I have had a rough couple of months with Releash. I had to go through heartworm treatment and then I was not even sure I wanted to live anymore. However, I have decided that love, attention and couches are worth getting up every morning for? I get along with dogs but am very soft natured so would prefer fur buddies with a calm and quiet nature. I live with two cats and they are fine too. I have a beagle voice to announce when something is out of the ordinary but even the deer in the yard donât pay it much attention! So humiliating.. 
If you are looking for a very calm, soft and loving buddy that still has things to learn but is willing to put his best paw forward .. Please fill out an application and put âI want to love on Perryâ I will review all apps and the couches offered!

name: Esme
description:
Esme is a sweet young dachshund mix female who weighs 25 lb and is approximately 1 year old.  She is relatively low shed but not âhypoallergenicâ.  This pretty girl was rescued the day after she gave birth to 2 puppies (Elsa and Anna) on a county shelter floor and has done a remarkable job as a young momma dog of raising these sweet young puppies.  While she has been in foster care she has proven herself to be a charming houseguest.  She is housebroken and will go to the door when she needs to go out.  She is a little low rider with soulful brown eyes and an infectious smile. She is an awesome couch snuggler and loves laying across her human for belly rubs and head scratches.  Outdoors she is a happy dog.  She literally bounces across her foster momâs backyard chasing birds or balls.  She loves to chew on nylabones and antlers and her forever home will need an assortment of same! She has been âhome schooledâ while weaning her puppies and knows sit, down and stay and is making progress on walking on the leash (please bear in mind she is part dachshund).  She has been sweet with other dogs her size.  She has done well with older children and is expected to be fine with younger kids as well.  (Cats are an unknown at this time, as her foster parents are highly allergic.) Apply today to meet her she will be ready to go to her forever home after March 23rd.
