description:
Meet Ollie!

This feisty but cute little guy was saved from death row a couple of times...the rescue who originally âsavedâ him was going to return him to the shelter to be euthanized when he showed barrier aggression upon arrival, but a rescue friend reached out to us as a last ditch effort to save him.  He was very defensive at first but once he bonds heâs a cuddly playful sweetheart!  The caring kennel staff at our vet Animal Clinic of Morris Plains spent a lot of extra time during his stay there getting him to trust them so his true personality could shine through his initial fears.  Ollie is about 5-6 years old and gets along with most other dogs, weighs 12lbs and we think he may be a min pin/Yorkie or Schnauzer mix?  Oh, and he has the cutest little natural Mohawk!  Heâs looking for an adult home with someone who will respect his space and possessions especially at first and give him time to bond- you will be rewarded with an adorable loyal best friend who will make you laugh every day with his antics and will literally jump into your arms for attention!  Heâs not a fan of vets and groomers- heâs the type who has to get to know you before being handled like that.  Email njwoof@cs.com to meet this special survivor!

name: Sheriff
description:
Cute little Sheriff is once again looking for the perfect home that understands his quirks...this 3 year old Shih Tzu/maybe Havanese? Mix was brought to the local pound when his owners passed away.  He was very nervous and defensive there and doesnât trust strangers but bonds quickly and then is a cuddly active companion.  He needs an adult only household as he can get protective of what he considers his...food,toys, his home and his people.  He has been doing well with other small dogs in his foster home and may do well living with a compatible doggie friend.  Email njwoof@cs.com to meet him if you are experienced with little dogs with a big attitude and willing to work with him We do not have a shelter- all our pets are in foster homes and can be seen by appointment only during the week, or at our weekly pet adoptions every Sunday at the Animal Clinic of Morris Plains from 12:30 to 3PM at 3009 Route 10 East, Morris Plains, NJ. name: Kenny-LOVES DOGS!
description:
Kenny is an adorable scruffy Jack Russell pup who is about 18 months old and looking for a special patient person.  He likely came from a backyard breeder/puppy mill situation where he was never handled or didnât have any positive human interactions and he is very skittish and fearful.  He LOVES other dogs and transforms into a happy playful pup around them, and will require a home with at least one other friendly social dog for him to follow and learn from.  He has come a long way in his foster homes and now loves going for walks on leash, is crate-trained and housebroken, and even gets along with cats!  Please email njwoof@cs.com if you are interested in meeting this adorable shy pup

description:
Koko is a 5 year old Lhasa or Shih Tzu mix surrendered due to his ownerâs living situation.  He has warmed up a lot and is a happy friendly guys as long as you respect his space at first, and seems happy around other dogs.  Koko is under 20lbs full grown and has been neutered, his mats shaved and had a much needed dental.  He is looking for an adult home with someone who will respect his space and take time to earn his trust.  Email njwoof@cs.com to meet him

name: Suzie-GENTLE AND QUIET!
description:
Suzie is a beautiful 8 year old mix whose owner became ill and couldnât care for her any longer.  We think she is a whippet/greyhound type mix and looks like a little deer with big doe eyes.  Sheâs nervous at first but sweet and intelligent, quiet and well behaved in the house and rides well in the car.  Sheâs untrusting at first but warms up to new people quickly and loves butt-scratches!  Suzie is 45-50lbs and has been spayed and updated on shots.  Sheâs looking for a quiet adult  retirement home and someone to love her for the rest of her life.  Email njwoof@cs.com to meet her!

name: Kelly
description:
UPDATE: Kelly had her first surgery to remove one whole mammary chain of tumors and all were benign!  Once she has healed she will have surgery to remove the rest of the tumors and we are hoping for the same good news!  Sheâs doing well in foster care, good with the other dogs and very cuddly once she bonds.  

Kelly is an adorable senior Shih Tzu mix who was brought to a local shelter in rough shape, very matted, terrified and cranky.  She has mammary tumors on almost every gland which may or may not be cancer (could have been easily prevented if only she was spayed when younger- please just spay your dogs people!?) and will be having surgery this week...stay tuned for updates as we learn more.  She is a sweet cuddly girl on her terms although she can get grumpy getting out of her bed sometimes (who isnât!?).  Email njwoof@cs.com if you are interested in fostering or adopting once she is ready... thanks to your generous donations over the holiday season we were able to take in this girl who had no other options without hesitation!

description:
Elton is an adorable 8 year old short haired Doxie mix looking for a home.  He is very friendly and social meeting new people and is spunky and energetic for a senior and in great shape.  Like so many doxies he doesnât like anyone messing with his food or toys, and likes his own space and not to be bothered when heâs sleeping...âlet sleeping dogs lieâ as the saying goes.  Email njwoof@cs.com to meet this cutie.  He is 15lbs full grown, neutered and updated on shots.

description:
Edmund is an adorable little senior chi mix who came to us from the Elizabeth shelter after being found as a stray.  Edmund is quite a talkative little character and has a lot to say, but is all talk.  He will grumble at new people but then wants to be petted.  He's good with other dogs and a lot of fun if you love quirky little dogs:)  Email njwoof@cs.com if you are interested in meeting him! name: Sophia
description:
Sophia is a special little chihuahua who has been through a lot and is looking for a safe and responsible home.  This little girl came from a hoarding situation originally, and got spooked and slipped out of her harness (never trust harnesses for skittish dogs!!!  All our dogs wear martingale collars at all times!)  in her foster home through another rescue.  She was loose for 5 days before being trapped by our friends at Buddha Dog Rescue & Recovery and making her way to us.  Sophia is shy and fearful with new people and situations and needs time to bond, but once she does she is a playful energetic little Velcro dog!  She loves male dogs and is looking for a calm adult home with at least one other doggie boyfriend for her to follow and hang out with. Sophia is 2-3 years old and 10lbs.  Email njwoof@cs.com if you can provide her with the safety and security she is looking for.

We do not have a shelter- all our pets are in foster homes and can be seen by appointment only during the week, or at our weekly pet adoptions every Sunday at the Animal Clinic of Morris Plains from 12:30 to 3PM at 3009 Route 10 East, Morris Plains, NJ. name: Lance & Coco
description:
Lance and Coco are 2 very special dogs looking for a very special home.  Their owner, a fellow rescuer and former adopter of ours, passed away suddenly and unexpectedly leaving them homeless.  Her friend had taken them in temporarily until they find a permanent home.  
Lance (red with black muzzle) is a 7 year old boxer mix and Coco (tan and white) is a tall lanky 6 year old Great Dane mix.  They have lived with a cat and welcomed many foster dogs over the years.  Lance is a bit nervous with men at first until he gets to know them, and Coco is a friendly goofball.  They are devoted to each other and must be placed TOGETHER.   They are altered, updated on shots and have been very well cared for and loved since their owner rescued them as puppies.  
Please email njwoof@cs.com and send an application from our website www.secondchance.petfinder.com if you can honor Laurie's memory and open your home to this adorable odd couple.

We do not have a shelter- all our pets are in foster homes and can be seen by appointment only during the week, or at our weekly pet adoptions every Sunday at the Animal Clinic of Morris Plains from 12:30 to 3PM at 3009 Route 10 East, Morris Plains, NJ. name: XP Gibbs - Washington, NJ
description:
Gibbs was a service dog for an elderly man who recently passed away. Now this boy needs a new home - he is a Boxer/Lab/Shepherd mix, 8 years old, who weighs 73 pounds. He loves people and loves his toys but he must be the only dog in his new home.

If you think you have a place for Gibbs or would like more information, please contact Carol at 908-652-1424 or ccarchie.ck@gmail.com - Gibbs is currently located in Washington, NJ.

name: Becca
description:
Age: 10 months old    Located in a foster home in NJ
Weight: 46 lbs
Vet Record: 100% vaccinated, spayed, microchipped, female

Meet Becca, the explorer! This marvellous girl loves to go hiking, swimming and enjoys car rides. She will be an amazing companion for outdoor adventures! 

Becca is house-trained and has good house manners. Most importantly, Becca is a very smart girl. She learns commands quickly, listens well, and is very eager to please. With her inquisitive nature, Becca would enjoy and excel in obedience training! This girl is very sweet and affectionate, loves to snuggle and belly rubs. She is a perfect medium size dog with a soft and silky coat that does not shed much.

Becca is located in a foster home in NJ that she shares with 3 dogs and 2 cats, everyone gets along wonderfully. Becca loves to play with toys and other dogs and would be an excellent playmate. Becca is all about her people and will want to be with you wherever you are. She can be a bit cautious with strangers and might need some time to warm up. Once she is comfortable, Becca will be a loyal friend.

Becca is looking for a loving, active owner preferably with the fenced-in yard. Ready to meet this Becca?  Put in your application today and we'll connect you with the foster family.

More info: http://www.sochidogs.org/becca
Adoption application: http://www.sochidogs.org/adoption-inquiry 
Learn about our rescue: http://www.sochidogs.org/aboutus/ 
Find us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/sochidogrescue/

name: Skipper
description:
Meet these beautiful 8-week-old Black Labrador Retriever mixed pups! In this litter, there are six boys and three girls. These pups were evacuees from Hurricane Dorian. They are very lucky to be alive and well. These cuties could not be more ready to find their forever homes. They are happy, healthy, and social pups who love absolutely everyone and anyone they meet. Other dogs and cats are definitey their best friends. At their young age, they have began to work on their house, crate and leash training. They are all doing really well! Now, all these black-coated beauties need are forever homes to call their own!

They are up-to-date on vaccinations and microchipped.

Home for Good Dog Rescue (HFGDR) is a 100 percent foster-based rescue located in Summit with offices in Berkeley Heights, NJ. All of our dogs live in loving local foster homes until they find forever families of their own. Our fosters begin basic training, housebreaking, and leash walking skills to help pair you with the perfect pup for life! 

We update Petfinder and our website multiple times daily, so if a dog is available on Petfinder and our website they are still available for adoption. We process all our applications in the order we receive them, and for that reason sometimes the dog or dogs in whom you are interested in may be adopted before your own processing concludes.

In order to apply for adoption and set up an individual meet and greet with one of our dogs, please visit us at www.HomeforGoodDogs.org. 

Find us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/HomeForGoodDogRescue.

name: Hudson
description:
Hudson is 8 weeks old.  He was part of a litter of 9 hurricane Dorian evacuees. He is a Black Labrador Retriever mix.  In his litter, there are six boys and three girls.  While he is lucky to be alive and well he has a temporary broken leg.  Hudson, while being evacuated, broke his leg.  He was seen by an orthopedic surgeon at Garden State Vet Specialist and was put in a splint and he will make a full recovery.  Hudson is very playful and sweet.  He will make a great addition to any family that is lucky enough to adopt this special pup.  He is a very social pup too.  He is crate trained and working on house breaking. His foster mom says he is a special boy who deserves only the best home.  

He is up-to-date on vaccinations and microchipped.

name: Luna
description:
Meet Luna. She was thrown away when her dad went into a nursing home and his daughter couldn't be bothered to care for her. She is about 7 years old.  She still has a lot of life in her and a lot of love to give.  Luna LOVES water, she is a great swimmer and would be a great passenger on a boat.  If you love the water, Luna is your girl.  Luna is housebroken and walks well on a leash. Her previous owners had lots of grandchildren so she has been around kids and loves them.   She also loves other dogs.  Luna is a smart girl who is very treat motivated and easy to train.  She will lay down in her pool...then come to you for a treat before she goes inside.  

Luna is spayed, up to date with vaccinations and looking for a forever home.

 Home for Good Dog Rescue (HFGDR) is a 100 percent foster-based rescue located in Summit with offices in Berkeley Heights, NJ. name: Paris
description:
How cute am I? I am a sexy senior at 13 years of age. My name is Paris and I am a  Shih Tzu. My 2 legged mom developed cancer, lost her home and job, and had to move where dogs were not allowed.  Hence, I am now old and homeless.  I need a forever home so that I can live out my golden years.  I still have a lot of life left in me.  I love kids, cats, and other dogs and I am very low maintenance. I am housebroken, spayed, fully vaccinated and microchipped. Won't you open up your heart and home to me?

name: XP Shaggy & Sunny - Wharton, NJ - URGENT!
description:
TIME IS RUNNING OUT..Dad dad is losing his home so Shaggy & Sunny are soon to be homeless also. Since they have nowhere to go, we are hoping someone will be able to give one of them or even both of them a place to go.

Shaggy & Sunny are 10-year-old Shih Tzus who are fixed, up to date with vaccines and are good with people young and old. They are friendly with other dogs but when they see cats, they bark at them so maybe a cat free home would be best. In spite of their age, they are in good health & not on any medications. They enjoy playing and eating - who doesn't? Dad has been feeding them Alpo and Pedigree dog foods.

Shaggy & Sunny would love to go to a new home together, but the most important thing is that they have a safe place to go so if that means two separate homes, then that is what their dad will have to do.

Shaggy & Sunny are NOT with Eleventh Hour Rescue but we are helping their dad to network them for new homes. If you are interested in meeting either or both of the dogs, please contact Armando at gomez782@aol.com or 901-210-0175 - they are currently located in Wharton, NJ.

name: Sprite
description:
Meet this social butterfly! At all of 9 pounds and 3 months old, Sprite is awaiting her forever home. According to this sweethearts foster mom, \"Sprite is the definition of friendly, she has to greet every dog and make friends with everyone she meets. She loves getting peoples attention and being loved on. She is super cute and grabs anyone's attention. She is a high energy pup and a wiggle worm, not so much running around, more so playing with others. She would make the perfect family companion!\" Sprite is a Yellow Labrador Retriever mix. She is also working very hard on her housebreaking and leash walking skills. She sleeps through the night in her crate without making a peep. This sweet, social, and loveable pup cannot wait to find the perfect forever home!

Sprite is spayed, up-to-date on vaccinations, and microchipped.

name: Lady
description:
Meet Lady, the absolutely stunning, adorable, Golden Retriever mixed pup! According to this girls foster mom, \"Lady is a little girl who is very well behaved and sweet. She has a super-soft coat, paired with gorgeous gold eyes. She reminds me of the lady and the tramp. Lady gets along great with other animals and would make the perfect sibling.\" Lady is working very hard on her leash training skills in her foster home. She also sleeps through the night in her crate without a peep. She is about 3.5-months-old, 14 pounds at the moment and growing like a weed! Lady is a happy-go-lucky, eager-to-please pup who simply cannot wait to find her forever family!

Lady is spayed, up-to-date on vaccinations, and microchipped.

name: Sadie
description:
Age: 9 months old    Located in a foster home in NJ
Weight: 32 lbs
Vet Record: 100% vaccinated, spayed, microchipped, female

Say hello to the sweetest Sadie! Sadie is super cute and affectionate. She loves to play with toys and hang out on the backyard with other dogs and kids. 

Sadie is all about her people. She is a very loving gal and does not have any sign of aggression but she can be timid around new people and she needs time to be comfortable.  Once she knows you she will be a good friend.  Sadie will do well in the home with a furry sibling and she needs a home with a fenced-in yard. 

Sadie is located in a foster home in NJ where she has great house manners. Sadie is about 9 months old and 34 lbs and fully grown. 
We are looking for a very loving family for Sadie who can understand and appreciate her gentle soul and in turn, we are sure, she will be a loyal companion for years to come. Put in your application today and weâll connect you with the foster family to meet this sweet girl


More info: http://www.sochidogs.org/sadie
Adoption application: http://www.sochidogs.org/adoption-inquiry 
Learn about our rescue: http://www.sochidogs.org/aboutus/ 
Find us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/sochidogrescue/

name: Gimli
description:
Meet the Hobbit litter! These adorable Basset Hound mixes are all about 4 months old and about 30 pounds each. Each sibling in this litter looks a bit different. Tolkien has the longest legs and is the most athletic. Bilbo is the most confident, affectionate one and will run up to you. Belladonna is the only girl. She is very sweet, reserved, and cute. Gimli is the attention lover who will do anything for a belly rub. All these pups are crate trained and walk wonderfully on the leash. They do well with other dogs and cats. They would each make perfect family companions too! All these sweethearts need now are forever families to call their own.

The Hobbit Litter is spayed/neutered, up-to-date on vaccinations, and microchipped. 

Home for Good Dog Rescue (HFGDR) is a 100 percent foster-based rescue located in Summit with offices in Berkeley Heights, NJ. All of our dogs live in loving local foster homes until they find forever families of their own. Our fosters begin basic training, housebreaking, and leash walking skills to help pair you with the perfect pup for life! 

We update Petfinder and our website multiple times daily, so if a dog is available on Petfinder and our website they are still available for adoption. We process all our applications in the order we receive them, and for that reason sometimes the dog or dogs in whom you are interested in may be adopted before your own processing concludes.

In order to apply for adoption and set up an individual meet and greet with one of our dogs, please visit us at www.HomeforGoodDogs.org. 

Find us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/HomeForGoodDogRescue.

name: Buff
description:
Meet Buff! This absolutely adorable 4-month-old Black Labrador Retriever mix is awaiting his forever home here in New Jersey. Buff is a very easy-going, chill puppy. He is going to be a big sturdy strong boy once he is fully grown as he is already almost 30 pounds. He is very laid back and gets along well with anyone and everyone, dogs and cats included. Buff does well on a leash and is also crate trained. He cannot wait to find his people!

Buff is neutered, up-to-date on vaccinations, and microchipped. 

Home for Good Dog Rescue (HFGDR) is a 100 percent foster-based rescue located in Summit with offices in Berkeley Heights, NJ. All of our dogs live in loving local foster homes until they find forever families of their own. Find us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/HomeForGoodDogRescue.

name: XP Bozi - Somerset, NJ
description:
From his owner: Meet Bozi, a 1-year-old purebred American Bulldog. He is a great family dog who loves children and other dogs (no exposure to cats so they're an unknown). He enjoys long walks and playing with his toys. He is a very quiet dog and doesn't bark much unless told to (he barks on command). He is crate trained and house broken. His favorite snacks are beef jerky and beef bacon. He would make a great addition to any family especially one with children. He loves to cuddle and be rubbed under his belly. He is also easy to train and love.

Bozi is NOT with Eleventh Hour Rescue but they are helping his owners with the rehoming process. If you are interested in meeting him, please contact Kymberly at kymberly_stocks@yahoo.com - Bozi is currently located in Somerset, NJ.

name: XP Molly - Newark, NJ
description:
Meet Molly - she's a sweet-as-pie Brindle/Blue Nose Pit Bull who needs a new place to live. Molly is 3 years old & she LOVES to cuddle! As you can see in her photos, she loves kids and meeting new people - she loves to play and does well with other dogs, too.

Molly is an amazing dog overall - she's the biggest gentle giant you could ever meet. She's housetrained & quiet - she doesn't bark at all. She's always a happy camper and loves loves loves to be with her family at all times.

Molly is NOT with Eleventh Hour Rescue but we are helping network her so that she may find a new home. If you are interested in meeting Molly, please contact Amber at 862-322-9789. Molly is currently located in Newark, NJ.

name: XP Mace - Dover, NJ
description:
Mace is NOT with Eleventh Hour Rescue but we are posting the dog on our web site to help his caretaker find a new home for him. If you are interested in meeting Mace, please call or text 973-223-0625.

Mace is an 8-year-old Mastiff whose owner can no longer care for him. He is up to date on his vaccines & he's currently located in Dover, NJ.

name: Nora
description:
Nora is a lovely 7 year old, female, Norwich Terrier we are looking to rehome. She's friendly to people, but like most terriers, she can be scrappy with other female dogs of her size. She would get along fine with a larger dog or a male dog. 
Nora is spayed and vaccinated. She is missing 2 toes on her left rear leg as a result of getting a string wrapped around it when she was young. They required amputation. But, she's adjusted well and gets around fine. With a typical haircut, the hair covers the feet so this isn't obvious and doesn't affect her appearance.
She is accustomed to being able to get out into a fenced yard at will via a doggy door. Her adopter will need to be willing to work with her housebreaking skills if you don't have one in your home environment. Having a fenced area and time and patience to help her make this adjustment will be helpful during this process. She lives on one level so would also need to be trained to do steps if needed.

This is a referral listing to help her get a good home. She is located out of state ( she is not located in NJ) and any interested applicants would need to be willing to travel for adoption. Her adoption fee is $350 to cover her spay and vaccine costs. NO AKC papers are given with adoptions.

If you are interested or have any questions, please contact Erica Cerny at ecerny@optonline.net or 973-361-6790. More information and pictures will be posted shortly.

name: Nellie
description:
Nellie is a lovely 7 year old, female, Norwich Terrier. She's friendly to people, but like most terriers, she can be scrappy with other female dogs of her size. She would get along fine with a larger dog or a male dog. 
Nellie is spayed and vaccinated.

If you are interested or have any questions, please contact Erica Cerny at ecerny@optonline.net or 973-361-6790. More information and pictures will be posted shortly.

name: XP Monster (located in Keyport)
description:
This is Monster! She is not part of our rescue but she is listed as a courtesy for her owners who are looking for a new home for her.

Monster is a super loving, sweet girl who loves cuddling - she'd be the perfect companion for those cold winter nights which are surely on their way! Her favorite thing to do is run laps around the backyard and play with tennis balls. She especially loves to do that in the winter time in the snow.

Monster is a 7-year-old Shepherd mix who weighs 55 pounds. She is spayed & is up to date on her shots. She has been in her current home for the past 3 years but recently she has started scuffling with the other female in the home. She loves people but should go to a home where the kids are older plus she is not a fan of cats.

If you're interested in adopting her, please contact her owner directly. Kaitlin at 973 567 1586 or by emailing metalkatart@gmail.com - Monster is currently located in Keyport, NJ.

name: XP Sassy - Montclair, NJ
description:
Sassy is a beautiful 35 pound Pit Bull mix who is around 2 years old. She loves to play fetch with a tennis ball and is extremely loyal to her owners/family. She has nipped strangers though but has not hurt anyone.

We are heartbroken that we cannot keep her in a very busy household with many guests in and out each day. She would do best in a home where she has much room to run and frolic. She is a very loving & loyal dog to those who love her. As you can see in her photos, Sassy gets along with cats but can be picky about her doggy friends.

Sassy is NOT with Eleventh Hour Rescue but we are helping her owners with the rehoming process. If you are interested in meeting Sassy, please contact Jennifer directly at jmburke112@gmail.com - she is currently located in Montclair, NJ.

name: XP Ace & Buddha - Iselin, NJ
description:
Ace and Buddha are looking for new places to live - they do not have to go to the same home. Ace is brindle & white while Buddha is the blue nose Pit Bull Both dogs are under a year old & are neutered. They have basic training and are crate trained, too. They are currently located in Iselin, NJ.

Ace and Buddha are NOT with 11th Hour Rescue but we are helping with the rehoming process. If you would like to meet these dogs, please contact Diane by email at diana.doyle2116@icloud.com

name: XP Louie - Morris County, NJ
description:
At 13 years of age, Louie finds himself looking for a new place to live. He is a purebred Beagle who likes company & is a friendly companion. His owners tell us that he is in good health overall but at his age he is slightly incontinent. If you like sweet senior dogs, please consider giving Louie a place to live out his days, feeling secure and loved.

Louie is not with Eleventh Hour Rescue but we are helping his owner with the rehoming process. If you would like to meet Louie, please contact Laura at 201-694-2797. Louie is currently located in the Morris County area of NJ.

name: XP Jasmine - Randolph, NJ
description:
Jasmine is a loving, snuggly girl who loves long walks and going for car rides but she's also very happy just relaxing with her humans. She is a good listener & learns quickly. She will sit, stay and is eager to give her paws to anyone who asks! She loves belly rubs, neck/shoulder massages and will give you many kisses in return. If you're looking for a sweet, affectionate girl who will love you to bits, please take a second look at Jasmine.

Jasmine is 8 years young & currently weighs about 50 pounds. She would do best in a mellow atmosphere with no other pets and no small children. She does not do well with dogs (or humans) who are high strung, barky & aggressive. Her perfect home would be one where she was the only \"princess\" in her castle.

Jasmine thrives on receiving attention and only wants to please and love her humans any chance she gets. Jasmine is housetrained & up to date on her shots.

Jasmine is NOT with Eleventh Hour Rescue - she is a \"courtesy post\" which means that they are helping her owners with the rehoming process. She is currently located in Randolph, NJ.

If you are interested in Jasmine, please contact Joanie at pookiepalch@optonline.net or 973-641-0471 for more information and to schedule a meet & greet.

name: ABBEY
description:
Abbey is a gorgeous 5-year-old greyhound mix who came into her home at 5 months of age. She was raised with many dogs around, but as sheâs matured her desire to have other dogs around has diminished. We are trying to find Abbey a home where she will get undivided attention and have her humans to herself.  She is a bit aloof when meeting new people but as long as people let her get to know them on her terms she settles in nicely. Sheâs extremely loving with her people, enjoys snuggling and gives gentle kisses often, but doesnât do well with active or small children. She walks extremely well on a leash, and while she gets slightly reactive when she sees other dogs during walks, she can easily be re-directed with treats and praise. Abbey is an independent player, and if given a rope-toy or a bone sheâll play all by herself for quite some timeâ¦ for some reason she plays best with these items if a person she enjoys is watching her. She loves to run, and is extremely fast, so a fenced-in yard is necessary. Being a greyhound mix, she shouldnât be with any small animals (namely cats, rodents, etc.). Sheâs very vocal, and makes strange howling sounds, but when sheâs relaxed she doesnât make a peep. She does love her crate, and will settle into it nicely. Abbey is totally vetted and ready and waiting for a single pup home.
Please contact us at allstarpets@comcast.net if you would like to meet this stunning lady. She is located in North Plainfield, NJ.

name: Juicy Ms Jenette
description:
Hi there, my name's Jenette but my friends all call me âJenniâ and YOU should too cause EVERYONE is MY friend ! I'm an 4 to 5 year old, spayed female Dutch Shepherd who Mare swears is far more like a 3 year old, energy wise... probably as she's far more accustomed to those lethargic lumps she calls âBullysâ though they're all very nice, lol. I'm known to be a FABULOUS playmate for other dogs; helping Mare here in rescue by stabilizing THREE young males and teaching them the ropes... Hey, someone's gotta to teach those boys their social skills and manners ! (hehe) I'm also an athletic person's dream ~ you like walks, hiking or running, Iâm your girl ~ I can be the the consummate athlete OR charming couch potato to echo YOUR choice for the day ! I'm just a sweet, LOVABLE clown that ADORES hugs and spending quality time with my human and canine friends. I enjoy all my friends at our multi dog indoor foster home and am SUPER NICE to everyone I meet ~ it always pays to be a Lady so I've worked diligently to learn that skill as well. I have a STABLE, even temperament; am HAPPY, intelligent, EASY to train, AFFECTIONATE, extremely GENTLE and very well behaved indoors knowing thatâs the place to be kicked back. Iâm a very SWEET girl whoâs SUPER well socialized, housebroken, crate trained and I even sit nicely for treats (immediately AND without being asked, thank you very much :) I loooooove to play and especially enjoy car rides and looooove playing in the water! I have a heart of gold, and am GREAT with children because I love humans of all sizes. I learn REALLY quickly and love to please, especially in response to an experienced, calm, assertive pack leader that I respect. My foster Mom says Iâm a GREAT companion because I'm such a SWEETIE, love to please my human(s) and have a heart as BIG as all outdoors !!!

Absolutely DARLING Soul just Looking for a Friend ;)

Why wait??? Simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private \"By Appointment Only\" showing at our \"Adoptions in the Park\" !!! Or contact us via our petabulls.com/adopt website. PLEASE include YOUR phone number on all inquiries as we are RARELY around the computer these days :) Open 10 am to 6 pm Wens thru Mon. Closed Tuesdays.

Come meet the PACK at our Simply Diego's (formerly Wild Pet Food Plus) Pet Adoption event Saturday, Sept 21st, from 12 noon to 5pm - 3301 Menaul Blvd NE Suite 10, Albuquerque, NM 87107. We hope to see YOU there !!!

OR join the entire Pet-A-Bulls PACK at the national Coldwell Banker Pet Adoption event Saturday, Sept 28th, from 11am to 3pm - 6767 Academy Rd NE, Albuquerque, NM 87109. We hope to see YOU there !!!

name: Mesmerizing LITTLE Mr Mignon ~ Schnorkie
description:
PLEASE NOTE: Mignon is living happily in foster and will ONLY be available at our Simply Diego's adoption event on 9/21. Please see below for details.

Hi, I'm Mignon, so named because I'm known to be such a TENDER little DELICACY with my ânuttyâ facial expressions, sweet personality, flamboyant style and AMAZING character ! I'm a 2 year old male Schnorkie (Yep, it's a real breed now folks! Google: Schnauzer / Yorkie blend ~ who knew !?!) who's really a DARLING, super SMART, inquisitive,GENTLE, funny LITTLE bundle of PURE JOY ! I am ever so slightly shy at first from all the many rapid changes in my short life but warm up to everyone instantly if you simply give me two seconds and then I learn new things immediately cause I'm super, SUPER SMART and VERY WILLING to please! Once I'm comfortable, I literally prance everywhere I go, out to politely strut my stuff for all my many admirers who say I'm sooooooo cute! To top that, I'm working diligently on my housebreaking skills, already crate trained and even sits and/or PAWS for treats and attention ! My rescue friends promise I'll easily get the perfect home everyone agrees that I TRULY deserve ~ bless their hearts for lovin me so much. At only 18 pounds and 12 inches tall (at the withers), some folks would consider me TINY but my heart is as BIG as ALL outdoors and I'm EASY to take anywhere YOU'D like to go ~ I promise to shower YOU with love and a life time of devotion ! Iâm just a lovable, LITTLE, very HAPPY house/lap dog who would soooooo love to have my very own human(s) again :) I âpromiseâ to be the BESTEST BOY ~ would YOU be MY new fur-ever friends (?!?) I would love to hang out with YOU !!!

Rags to Riches w AMAZING Manners & PURE Devotion = A+++

Why wait??? Simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private \"By Appointment Only\" showing at our \"Adoptions in the Park\" !!! Or contact us via our petabulls.com/adopt website. PLEASE include YOUR phone number on all inquiries as we are RARELY around the computer these days :) Open 10 am to 6 pm Wens thru Mon. Closed Tuesdays.

Come meet the PACK at our Simply Diego's (formerly Wild Pet Food Plus) Pet Adoption event Saturday, Sept 21st, from 12 noon to 5pm - 3301 Menaul Blvd NE Suite 10, Albuquerque, NM 87107. We hope to see YOU there !!!

OR join the entire Pet-A-Bulls PACK at the national Coldwell Banker Pet Adoption event Saturday, Sept 28th, from 11am to 3pm - 6767 Academy Rd NE, Albuquerque, NM 87109. We hope to see YOU there !!!

Once I'm comfortable, I literally prance everywhere I go, out to politely strut my stuff for all my many admirers who say I'm sooooooo cute! To top that, I'm working diligently on my housebreaking skills, already crate trained and even sits and/or PAWS for treats and attention ! My rescue friends promise I'll easily get the perfect home everyone agrees that I TRULY deserve ~ bless their hearts for lovin me so much. At only 18 pounds and 12 inches tall (at the withers), some folks would consider me TINY but my heart is as BIG as ALL outdoors and I'm EASY to take anywhere YOU'D like to go ~ I promise to shower YOU with love and a life time of devotion ! Iâm just a lovable, LITTLE, very HAPPY house/lap dog who would soooooo love to have my very own human(s) again :) I âpromiseâ to be the BESTEST BOY ~ would YOU be MY new fur-ever friends (?!?) I would love to hang out with YOU !!!

Rags to Riches w AMAZING Manners & PURE Devotion = A+++

name: Tantilizing Ms Topanga
description:
Hi there, my name's Topanga and I'm said to be a GORGEOUS 18 month old, spayed female American Staffordshire Terrier who's known to be a TOTAL house dog! Just a LOVABLE little clown that ADORES hugs and frolicking with my human AND canine friends, especially my BFF and playmate, Tyris the English Mastiff, cause that stunning hunk of 200 lb love keeps me entertained all day long! We also volunteer our combined services to help Mare here in rescue by anchoring the alpha yard and thus setting the âtoneâ (ie, sterling example) for all the other dogs here in house. That's the a HIGHEST compliment possible here and one we give every effort to live up to! If you like walks, hiking or running, Iâm your girl ~ I can be the the consummate athlete OR a charming couch potato to echo YOUR choice for the day ! I enjoy all my friends at our multi dog indoor foster home and am SUPER NICE to everyone I meet ~ it always pays to be a Lady! I have a STABLE, even temperament; am CALM, intelligent, EASY to train, affectionate, extremely GENTLE and very well behaved indoors knowing thatâs the place to be kicked back. Iâm a very SWEET girl whoâs SUPER well socialized, housebroken, crate trained and I even sit nicely for treats (immediately AND without being asked, thank you very much :) I loooooove to play with toys and especially enjoy car rides and playing in the water! I have a heart of gold, and am GREAT with children because I love humans of ALL sizes. I learn REALLY quickly and love to please, especially in response to an experienced, calm, assertive pack leader that I respect. My foster Mom says Iâm the PERFECT companion because I'm BRILLIANT, live to please my human(s) and have a heart as BIG as all outdoors !!!

Loads of Special Character in this DARLING Gorgeous Girl !

Why wait??? Simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private \"By Appointment Only\" showing at our \"Adoptions in the Park\" !!! Or contact us via our petabulls.com/adopt website. name: Spectacular LIL Ms Scampi
description:
Hi there, I'm called Scampi, so named for my âwhole heartedâ facial expressions, sweet flamboyant confidence, self-assured style and AMAZING character ! I'm a 6 month old female Miniature Schnauzer / Terrier blend who's especially SWEET and LOADS of laughter cause I looooove life and everyone in it. âNEVER met a stranger and EVERYONE'S my friend 'cause the world is MY oyster and life is GOODâ ~ that's me, Me, ME ! I'm a GOOD GIRL and working diligently to learn my manners so that I'll grow into the canine ambassador my rescue friends describe ~ YAY ! I'm an inquisitive, adventurous little character who's thrilled that there's a whole world of new things to learn and explore right in my very own yard! I literally prance out everywhere I go, to politely strut my stuff for all my many admirers who say I'm sooooooo cute! My rescue friends promise me that I'll easily get the perfect home everyone agrees that I so TRULY deserve ~ bless their hearts for lovin me so much. I'm nearly full grown at 23 lbs and 12 inches tall (at the withers) so some people might consider me LITTLE but my heart is as BIG as ALL outdoors and I'm EASY to take anywhere YOU'D like to go !!! Flawlessly house, car, crate and leash trained since I've lived in an indoor home my entire life, I dearly love other dogs and all humans, big AND small and I do very well with cats and children too !!! Soon-to-be-altered, completely up to date on ALL my vaccinations, chipped and VERY sweet ~ do YOU need a cuddle partner ??? Iâm just a lovable little CLOWN who'll keep you laughing for a life time of love, who would soooooo love to have my very own human(s) again :) I âpromiseâ to be the BESTEST BABY ~ won't YOU teach me some tricks (?!?) I would love to hang out with YOU !!!

Good Behavior, GREAT Personality, WICKED Smart !

Why wait??? Simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private \"By Appointment Only\" showing at our \"Adoptions in the Park\" !!! Or contact us via our petabulls.com/adopt website. name: Lovely Ms Leta Lestrange
description:
Hello there, my nameâs Leta Lestrange cause Mare's insistent on naming all her Rotties for Harry Potter characters but my rescue friends call me Leta cause I'm so SWEET, easy and GENTLE ! Iâm a pure bred, 3 year old spayed female Rottweiler who would love to be YOUR house dog âcause Iâm completely trustworthy (no furniture chewing or accidents !!) and I looooove to spend time anywhere with my people! I was a happy, one owner girl who's human fell too ill to continue caring for me (must have been really bad since I require nothing more than food or potty breaks so I really, REALLY worried about my human for awhile !!!), then I found myself at an overcrowded rural shelter where the nice folks worked really hard to get me comfortable and into rescue where I'm currently hanging out peacefully with my son, Lord Voldemort, a gorgeous young buck who makes me feel all young and pretty again, he's such a sweetheart and I am sooooooo proud of that boy! I'm ever so slightly shy at first from all the many rapid changes in my short life but warm up to everyone instantly if you simply give me two seconds and then I learn new things immediately cause I'm super SMART and VERY WILLING to please; I'm amazingly devoted to my people! Just look into my eyes ~ I want so much to be loved! Iâm AMAZING with other dogs and loooove to learn so teach me some tricks! In return for your kindness, I promise to shower you with kisses and tons of love and devotion. Mare says Iâm super, SUPER sweet, the PERFECT gracious Lady AND the most DEVOTED dog sheâs ever had the pleasure to meet ~ sheâs sure YOUâll think so too!!!

All that AND More in a ROCK STAR Package !!!

Why wait??? Simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private \"By Appointment Only\" showing at our \"Adoptions in the Park\" !!! Or contact us via our petabulls.com/adopt website. PLEASE include YOUR phone number on all inquiries as we are RARELY around the computer these days :) Open 10 am to 6 pm Wens thru Mon. Closed Tuesdays.

name: Lovable Lord Voldemort
description:
Hi there, my name's Lord Voldemort 'cause I'm such a HAPPY character (and NOT a villain) so since Mare names all her Rotties for Harry Potter characters it just kinda fit !!! Don't be fooled by my stoic âbulldogâ looks (that's a joke folks, I'm just mirroring my friends here in rescue...) ~ Iâm really a 2 year old, neutered male Rottweiler who's known to be a really GENTLE, laid back, CALM, âMomma's (or Daddy's) boyâ that loves to snuggle or just lay quietly and content at your feet enjoying my bone. An EASY GOING, full grown fairly large sized, love~a~bull clown that's into focusing on and frolicking with my human and canine friends. SBM looking for the cuddly type, that's me, Me, ME!!! I have a super STABLE, even temperament so I'm CALM, quiet, HIGHLY INTELLIGENT, easy to train, SUPER affectionate, extremely GENTLE and very well behaved indoors knowing that's the place to be kicked back. Iâm a TOTAL house dog and a very SWEET boy whoâs super socialized, housebroken, crate trained and I even sit nicely for treats. In fact, until just recently I've enjoyed living in an indoor home my entire life, but no hard feelings though, life is GOOD these days with people who appreciate what a stellar personality and LOYAL friend I truly am! I make sure to announce the arrival of any strangers with a short series of alarm barks designed to alert you to unknown visitors but Iâm especially good with people ~ even the UPS man! My foster mom, Mare herself, says I'm the absolute âBESTEST BOYâ and calls me her SPECIAL âambassador,â guess that means Iâm a GOOD BOY! I have a heart of gold and learn really quickly 'cause I love to please my human(s), especially in response to an experienced, calm, assertive pack leader that I respect. She says I'm the PERFECT companion because I'm such a sweetie and have a heart as big as all outdoors! (I love her too :) ) Iâd really like to have a special person(s) of my very own, one whoâll fulfill my dream of having a pack leader, teach me new things and maybe even take me to classes where I can show off my talents ~ I promise to shower YOU with love and a life time of devotion in return!

Darling SWEET Looooooves Everyone He Meets w/ LOADS of Character !!!

Why wait??? Simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private \"By Appointment Only\" showing at our \"Adoptions in the Park\" !!! Or contact us via our petabulls.com/adopt website. PLEASE include YOUR phone number on all inquiries as we are RARELY around the computer these days :) Open 10 am to 6 pm Wens thru Mon. Closed Tuesdays.

name: Charming Mr Cesare
description:
Hi, my name's Cesare ~ yep, Yep, YEP, dat's ME, da BEST little Nobleman apprentice in training around these parts (grins) !!! I'm a 2 year old neutered male Great Pyrenees / White Shepherd blend who's sending out a special shout of THANKS to our rescue for taking me in and making my life soooooooo MUCH better, something for which I am VERY grateful ! In return, I work very hard to learn and then my mind manners, doing everything they ask after only being shown ONCE cause I truly appreciate the praise ~ and the treats ~ I get in return. Iâm just a QUIET but SWEET, gentle, LOVABLE clown that adores hugs and frolicking with my human and canine friends !!! If you like walks, hiking and/or (eventually) running, then Iâm YOUR BOY ~ the CONSUMMATE ATHLETE who also enjoys couch surfing when you're not âin the moodâ to play outdoors! I enjoy all my friends at our multi dog indoor foster home and am SUPER NICE to everyone I meet, it always pays to be gracious and FRIENDLY. I have a stable, CALM, even temperament, and I'm very INTELLIGENT, so I'm super EASY to train, AFFECTIONATE, loads of FUN and very well behaved indoors knowing thatâs the place to be kicked back. Iâm a SUPER SWEET guy whoâs super socialized, housebroken, crate trained and I even sit nicely for treats (immediately AND without being asked, thank you very much:). I have a heart of gold, and am FABULOUS with children because I love humans of all sizes. I learn REALLY quickly and looooove to please, especially in response to an experienced, calm, assertive pack leader that I respect. Mare says Iâm the PERFECT companion because I have a heart as big as all outdoors and she's sure you'll think so too!

Darling SWEET Dude Looooooves Everyone He Meets !!!

name: Janet
description:
Janet is as sweet as can be.  She is eager to follow and please.  She needs some confidence but will quickly progress into a nice outgoing, friendly dog.  Janet looks like a Doberman/Rottweiler mix of about 65 pounds.  She is slim and tall in build.  Janet was part of a hoarding case from San Miguel County (NM) and has been waiting a long time in the shelter for the case to be resolved so she can find her home.  She enjoys the company of other dogs and would do well with an outgoing friendly dog.  Janet is about 3-4 years old.  

Please inquire about Janet by emailing Julie at julie@hart2heartcanine.com

name: Stunning Mr Sholo
description:
Hi there, my name's Sholo and I'm a healthy, HAPPY, super EASY GOING 6 month old neutered male Labrador Retriever who's known to be a FABULOUS playmate for other dogs and will be an athletic person's dream ~ if you like walks, hiking or running, Iâm YOUR guy ~ Iâll be the consummate athlete OR the most CHARMING couch potato to echo YOUR choice for the day ! I'm just a LOVABLE clown that ADORES hugs and spending quality time with my human and canine friends. I enjoy all my friends at our multi dog indoor foster home and am SUPER NICE to everyone I meet ~ it always pays to be a Gentleman so I'm working diligently to perfect that skill as well. I have a STABLE, even temperament; am HAPPY, intelligent, EASY to train, AFFECTIONATE, extremely GENTLE and very well behaved indoors knowing thatâs the place to be kicked back. Iâm a very SWEET boy whoâs SUPER well socialized, housebroken, crate trained and I even sit nicely for treats (immediately AND without being asked, thank you very much :) I loooooove to play with toys and especially enjoy car rides and looooove the water! I have a heart of gold, and am GREAT with children because I absolutely those mini humans. I learn REALLY quickly and love to please, especially in response to an experienced, calm, assertive pack leader that I respect. Mare herself says Iâm a GREAT companion because I'm such a SWEETIE, love to please my human(s) and have a heart as BIG as all outdoors !!! PLUS, I promise to be the BESTEST BOY !!!

Sweet + SUPER Intelligent + HUGE Heart = WOW !!!

name: Cutie Pie Chimei de Chiwee
description:
Hi there, my name's Chimei cause I AM ! Iâm a 1 year old spayed female Chiweenie (Dachshund / Chihuahua blend) who receives RAVE reviews on the BEAUTY of my markings and DELIGHTFUL temperament everywhere we roam cause I'm especially SWEET and LOOOVE to snuggle ~ or just hang out with my people(s)! Some people might consider me SMALL but my heart is as BIG as ALL outdoors and my SPECTACULAR sense of humor with keep you laughing for a lifetime of LOVE !!! House, car, crate and leash trained since I've lived in an indoor home my entire life, I have an AMAZING sense of humor, SUPERBLY well mannered and I DEARLY LOVE other SMALL dogs and ALL humans (big AND small) plus I do very well with cats too but I especially looooove those hooman children !!! Iâm just a lovable, VERY laid back, CALM, quiet, GENTLE house/lap dog who would soooooo love to have my very own human family to love. Completely up to date on ALL my age appropriate vaccinations and VERY sweet ~ I promise to shower YOU with love and a life time of devotion ! I'm house, car, crate and leash ready, so from CUDDLY to CLOWN, my rescue friends claim I have it ALL !  Iâm just a lovable, LITTLE, very HAPPY house/lap dog who would soooooo love to have my very own human(s) again :) I âpromiseâ to be the BESTEST GIRL ~ would YOU be MY new fur-ever friends (?!?) I would love to hang out with YOU !!!  WoHoo !!!

Thoughtful, BRIGHT, Sweet, Cuddly LITTLE Girl full of FUN !!!

name: The Vivacious Velvet Angel
description:
Hi there, my rescue friends named me Velvet Angel, cause they say I AM ! Can you guess why ??? They say I'm a SPECTACULAR (awwww) 18 month old, spayed female American Pitbull Terrier (APBT) who's personality even outshines her looks AND I'm known to be a TOTAL house dog! Don't be fooled by my dignified facial expression though, cameras are VERY rude human inventions that most of MY species absolutely deplore... I'm truly just a LOVABLE clown that ADORES hugs and frolicking with my human and canine friends. If you like walks, hiking or touring around town, Iâm your girl ~ I can be the the consummate athlete OR charming couch potato to echo YOUR choice for the day ! I enjoy my many friends at our multi dog indoor foster home and am SUPER NICE to everyone I meet ~ it always pays to be a LADY. I have a STABLE, even temperament; am CALM, intelligent, EASY to train, affectionate, extremely GENTLE and very well behaved indoors knowing thatâs the place to be kicked back. Iâm a very SWEET girl whoâs SUPER well socialized, housebroken, crate trained and I even sit nicely for treats (immediately AND without being asked, thank you very much.) I loooooove to play with toys and especially enjoy car rides and playing in the water! But my FAVORITE thing is children ~ I absolutely adore those midget hoomans and make the BEST NANNY dog EVER !!!I have a heart of gold, learn REALLY quickly and love to please, especially in response to an experienced, calm, assertive pack leader that I respect. My foster Mom says Iâm the PERFECT companion because I'm BRILLIANT, live to please my human(s) and have a heart as BIG as all outdoors !!!

Easy girl who's NEVER Met a Stranger, Loves Everyone, Especially Children !!!

Why wait??? Simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private \"By Appointment Only\" showing at our \"Adoptions in the Park\" !!! Or contact us via our petabulls.com/adopt website. PLEASE include YOUR phone number on all inquiries as we are RARELY around the computer these days :) Open 10 am to 6 pm Wens thru Mon. Closed Tuesdays.

name: Beguling Mr Baltazar ~ American Bully
description:
Hi there, my name's Baltazar but I'm often called âBaltiâ for my SILLY sweet lil personality... I'm an 2 year old neutered male American Bully (APBT with LOTS of Bulldog back blood) ~ a true âItty Bitty Pocket Pittyâ who's just a HAPPY lil guy, BRIGHT and CHEERFUL is what I'm all about 'cause I want sooooo VERY much to find a nice family who will love me and be my fur-ever home! Some people consider me âSPECIALâ with my GORGEOUS, sleek, shiny blue fur but my rescue friends assure me that MY personality truly SHINES ! With just a smidgen of TLC and training from Mare and her friends, Iâve blossomed into the DARLING LITTLE CLOWN they knew was lurking inside. I'll do just about ANY thing to please you and steal your heart because I absolutely thrive on positive praise and affection :) Hey folks, life is GOOD these days and that's something I truly appreciate! I'm said to be a HAPPY, healthy, HYSTERICALLY FUNNY, outgoing, super (SUPER) smart, confident and totally ready to find my forever home! Iâm a very FRIENDLY boy who loves to run and play outside and I'm well behaved indoors, settling in nicely at your feet so we can read, nap or watch movies. My goofy facial expressions and quirkie little run (from the sheer JOY of being alive) keep everyone rolling in laughter, and I do LOVE to entertain! I also love long walks, hikes, jogging with my favorite human, or just about anything you care to do that lets us spend time together. I'm completely house, crate, car and even leash trained ~ putting my head through the loop and walking out on lead to go off for another adventure! Iâd really like to live the family lifestyle with a special person(s) of my very own, humans whoâll love me, teach me new things and maybe even take me to classes where I can show off my talents ~ I promise to shower YOU with love and a life time of devotion in return!

HUGE Heart + Good Manners = A True Treasure !!!

Why wait??? Simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private \"By Appointment Only\" showing at our \"Adoptions in the Park\" !!! Or contact us via our petabulls.com/adopt website. PLEASE include YOUR phone number on all inquiries as we are RARELY around the computer these days :) Open 10 am to 6 pm Wens thru Mon. Closed Tuesdays.

name: Darling Ms DoraCora
description:
Hi there, my name's DoraCora and I'm a 2 year old, spayed female Australian Cattle Dog genes thrown in here for good measure... lol. I'm known to be a FABULOUS playmate for other dogs; helping Mare here in rescue by stabilizing THREE young males and teaching them the ropes... Hey, someone's gotta to teach those boys their social skills and manners ! (hehe) I'm also an athletic person's dream ~ you like walks, hiking or running, Iâm your girl ~ I can be the the consummate athlete OR charming couch potato to echo YOUR choice for the day ! I'm just a sweet, LOVABLE clown that ADORES hugs and spending quality time with my human and canine friends. I enjoy all my friends at our multi dog indoor foster home and am SUPER NICE to everyone I meet ~ it always pays to be a Lady so I've worked diligently to learn that skill as well. I have a STABLE, even temperament; am HAPPY, intelligent, EASY to train, AFFECTIONATE, extremely GENTLE and very well behaved indoors knowing thatâs the place to be kicked back. Iâm a very SWEET girl whoâs SUPER well socialized, housebroken, crate trained and I even sit nicely for treats (immediately AND without being asked, thank you very much :) I loooooove to play with toys and especially enjoy car rides and looooove playing in the water! I have a heart of gold, and am GREAT with children because I love humans of all sizes. I learn REALLY quickly and love to please, especially in response to an experienced, calm, assertive pack leader that I respect. My foster Mom says Iâm a GREAT companion because I'm such a SWEETIE, love to please my human(s) and have a heart as BIG as all outdoors !!!

Sweet Personality, Loooves to Play, DARLING Soul !!!

name: Nala
description:
Beautiful Nala originally came from Cuba, NM, as a stray.  This extremely sweet girl is very loving and affectionate.  She is a very friendly, very nice dog.  She is good with dogs.  She has gotten along very well with her fellow rescue dog buddy.  She likes to be active, go for walks/runs, but also enjoys mellow time.  She would like to be a lap dog and sometimes forgets her size!   She weighs around 55 lbs and is about 2-3 years old.  Nala is a very mindful, respectful girl.  She is housetrained. 

Contact Trish at 505-907-3791 or email pacatrish@yahoo.com

name: Star
description:
Star
Female
Italian Greyhound / Terrier mix
Born 10/2014

Contact Kate at kmolsbe@gmail.com for more information about Star.

Starlight...Starbright - here is beautiful Star!!  Born approx. October 2014 and weighing 25 pounds, Star was recently returned to NMAF after 2.5 years when her family moved to Wisconsin and Star could not adapt to the change.  Rather than have her rehomed so far away, she flew back to ABQ and is safely back in foster care and doing well.  She has changed very little in her time gone from NM and is still the same sleek size and weight she was 2.5 years ago (wouldn't we all like that!!).  We think she is an Italian Greyhound mix because of her long legs and slender, graceful body, and she still loves to do her \"Ballerina Twirl\" at feeding time (see her video).  She has a shiny black coat that sheds very little, pretty white socks and a star shaped mark on her neck.  She loves soft touches under her chin, gives LOTS of kisses, and special stuffed toys - especially the stuffing!  Unfortunately, she doesn't like kitties but enjoys the company of other friendly dogs, though is not much of a \"player\" and could easily be happy as an only dog - preferably with someone that is retired or works from home.

Star came back to NMAF with some anxiety and reactivity issues which, with calming medication and retraining that includes impulse control with our trainer, Natalie Cabral, she has turned a corner and is ready for a new life!  NMAF will train her adopter with the skills required to work with her and keep her well balanced and happy.  She should not live with children as they bring on anxiety - this may be due to too much rough handling in her previous family where their were very small children present.  She would be a great dog for a single female or male in a quiet environment or a retired couple.  She is spayed, up-to-date on all shots, heartworm tested & on preventative, and microchipped.  She also uses a doggie door and is house-trained.  She does not attend our Adoption Clinic at PetSmart but can be met at her foster home most evenings.  This little girl is really special, sweet, and loving once she trusts you, and can be a wonderful companion for the right owner.

Because home visits are required, NMAF dogs cannot be adopted out of the greater Albuquerque / Santa Fe area.

Star does not attend our Adoption Clinic at PetSmart but can be met at her foster home most evenings.  Please contact the person listed above to meet Star.

Please visit our website at www.nmaf.org for more information.

name: Pretty Ms Padme Pia de Presa Canario
description:
Hello there my lovies, my name is Padme Pia or, as my Mare calls me ~ MY PRETTY! I'm a LOVELY 3 year old, pure bred, spayed female Presa Canario (Canary Island Mastiff) who is BEYOND well mannered and house trained ~ settling nicely at your feet to keep YOU company is MY favorite pass time :) Mare says Iâm a SWEET, lovable, furry HUG on four legs and I DO loooove to gently hug my hoomans! If you prize loyalty, Iâm your girl ~ Iâll stick by your side through thick and thin âcause Iâm the most devoted friend youâll ever encounter! I really enjoy spending time with my humans and canine friends here in our multi dog foster home and am super nice to everyone I meet. Some of the dogs can be a little intimidated by my size but my especially good social skills, extremely gentle nature and impeccable manners usually wins them over, it always pays to be a Gracious Lady. Typical of the original Mastiff breedings, I have a STABLE, even temperament, am CALM, intelligent, easy to train, AFFECTIONATE, extremely GENTLE and very WELL BEHAVED indoors knowing thatâs the place to be kicked back. Iâm a very sweet girl whoâs super socialized, housebroken, crate trained and I even sit nicely for treats (immediately AND without being asked, thank you very much :). I love to play with my people and especially enjoy car rides, loading up instantly in anticipation of the next adventure ~ perfect place for a nap! I have a heart of gold, and am super GOOD WITH CHILDREN because I love humans of all sizes and absolutely adore the little munchkins! I learn really quickly and love to please, especially in response to an experienced, calm, assertive pack leader that I respect. Mare says Iâm the PERFECT companion and breed ambassador because I have a heart as big as all outdoors ~ just call her, Iâd loooooove to meet YOU too!!!

Absolutely AMAZING Lady ~ Best of the BEST !!!

Why wait??? Simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private \"By Appointment Only\" showing at our \"Adoptions in the Park\" !!! Or contact us via our petabulls.com/adopt website. PLEASE include YOUR phone number on all inquiries as we are RARELY around the computer these days :) Open 10 am to 6 pm Wens thru Mon. Closed Tuesdays.

OR join the entire Pet-A-Bulls PACK at the national Coldwell Banker Pet Adoption event Saturday, Sept 28th, from 11am to 3pm - 6767 Academy Rd NE, Albuquerque, NM 87109. We hope to see YOU there !!!

name: Pretty Ms Padme Pia de Presa Canario
description:
Hello there my lovies, my name is Padme Pia or, as my Mare calls me ~ MY PRETTY! I'm a LOVELY 3 year old, pure bred, spayed female Presa Canario (Canary Island Mastiff) who is BEYOND well mannered and house trained ~ settling nicely at your feet to keep YOU company is MY favorite pass time :) Mare says Iâm a SWEET, lovable, furry HUG on four legs and I DO loooove to gently hug my hoomans! If you prize loyalty, Iâm your girl ~ Iâll stick by your side through thick and thin âcause Iâm the most devoted friend youâll ever encounter! I really enjoy spending time with my humans and canine friends here in our multi dog foster home and am super nice to everyone I meet. Some of the dogs can be a little intimidated by my size but my especially good social skills, extremely gentle nature and impeccable manners usually wins them over, it always pays to be a Gracious Lady. Typical of the original Mastiff breedings, I have a STABLE, even temperament, am CALM, intelligent, easy to train, AFFECTIONATE, extremely GENTLE and very WELL BEHAVED indoors knowing thatâs the place to be kicked back. Iâm a very sweet girl whoâs super socialized, housebroken, crate trained and I even sit nicely for treats (immediately AND without being asked, thank you very much :). I love to play with my people and especially enjoy car rides, loading up instantly in anticipation of the next adventure ~ perfect place for a nap! I have a heart of gold, and am super GOOD WITH CHILDREN because I love humans of all sizes and absolutely adore the little munchkins! I learn really quickly and love to please, especially in response to an experienced, calm, assertive pack leader that I respect. Mare says Iâm the PERFECT companion and breed ambassador because I have a heart as big as all outdoors ~ just call her, Iâd loooooove to meet YOU too!!!

Absolutely AMAZING Lady ~ Best of the BEST !!!

Why wait??? Simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private \"By Appointment Only\" showing at our \"Adoptions in the Park\" !!! Or contact us via our petabulls.com/adopt website. PLEASE include YOUR phone number on all inquiries as we are RARELY around the computer these days :) Open 10 am to 6 pm Wens thru Mon. Closed Tuesdays.

name: Remarkable Mr Win
description:
Hello there, dear humans. My rescue friends named me Windsor, saying I'm the perfectly ELEGANT Gentleman but YOU may call me Win as I much prefer the more suggestive abbreviated version. (We are all what we think. Thought to reality you know !) Iâm a 4 year old American Staffordshire Terrier who is known to be a VERY CALM, well-mannered, GENTLE CLOWN who enjoys a good snuggle and the consummate house dog who knows how to behave like a gentleman indoors OR out. I was well socialized from infancy and thus I am known to be FABULOUS with children and other dogs as I love to please my people. My foster Mother and host, Mare herself, states that I would easily make an exceptional town house (or condo) companion because I am so very relaxed indoors! Fortune truly smiled upon me when I arrived at her home as she affords special privileges to me, saying Iâm so HIGHLY INTELLIGENT, a REMARKABLE boy and one of the easiest dogs sheâs ever seenâ¦ In truth, I gladly do anything she asks for all the extra hugs and kisses that good behavior gains me !!! Iâve heard that laps are for sissies though so Iâll gently lay my head on your leg or lean into your arms for a big hug, and itâs superb to simply recline at your feet while entertaining myself with a favorite bone. I know to keep my âfour on the floor,â as I would never dream of jumping on a human and exhibit advanced behavioral skills with executing my âsit,â âstay,â âwait,â âload up,â âleave itâ and âoffâ commands while being completely house, crate, car and even leash trained ~ putting my head through the loop and stepping nicely out on lead to accompany you for yet another adventure! There are a multitude of other dogs here with which I am highly socialized and even made friends with nearly everyone in the group. I clearly relish the company of a pleasant female canine companion, such as my current Lady love, Ms Megan, with whom I treasure spending my days. I do know to announce the arrival of strangers though I am especially good with people ~ and particularly those miniature humans you people refer to as children, darling creatures those. I am allowed to sleep in a nice comfortable bed without a crate and I especially enjoy touring in the automobiles, even for lengthy trips. Mare deems me her special âbreed ambassador,â which apparently means that I am an EXCEPTIONAL BOY! I do long to have a special person(s) of my very own though, one who will teach me new things and maybe even take me to classes where I can show off my talents ~ I solemnly promise to shower YOU with love and a life time of devotion in return!

The PERFECT, Well Mannered Gentleman !!! A+++

Why wait??? Simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private \"By Appointment Only\" showing at our \"Adoptions in the Park\" !!! Or contact us via our petabulls.com/adopt website. PLEASE include YOUR phone number on all inquiries as we are RARELY around the computer these days :) Open 10 am to 6 pm Wens thru Mon. Closed Tuesdays.

Come meet the PACK at our Simply Diego's (formerly Wild Pet Food Plus) Pet Adoption event Saturday, Sept 21st, from 12 noon to 5pm - 3301 Menaul Blvd NE Suite 10, Albuquerque, NM 87107. We hope to see YOU there !!!

OR join the entire Pet-A-Bulls PACK at the national Coldwell Banker Pet Adoption event Saturday, Sept 28th, from 11am to 3pm - 6767 Academy Rd NE, Albuquerque, NM 87109. We hope to see YOU there !!!

name: Magnificent Ms Megan ~ American Bully
description:
Hi there, my name's Megan but everyone calls me Meg 'cause I'm the true \"HOT MOMMA\" in town! Iâm a pure bred, 4 year old, spayed female American Bully (Amstaff with LOTS of Bulldog back blood) who's REALLY gentle AND patient ! I'm just a EASY GOING, calm, KIND-HEARTED soul who loves to hang out with my humans and the consummate house dog who knows how to behave like a true LADY, both indoors AND out! Typical of the original Bully breedings, I have a STABLE, even temperament so I'm CALM, highly INTELLIGENT, easy to train, AFFECTIONATE, extremely GENTLE and very WELL BEHAVED indoors knowing thatâs the place to be kicked back. So Iâm known to be a super sweet girl who is amazingly well socialized, housebroken, crate trained (though I certainly don't need one) and even sit for treats and/or attention (automatically and without being asked, thank you very much). I love to lay at your feet and play with my bone(s) or favorite toys and especially enjoy car rides where I sit nicely to take in the scenery! I have a heart of gold, learn really quickly and love to please my people. There's also a LOT of other dogs here so I'm highly socialized so I've even made peace with Ms Sadie, the fairly bossy high Priestess of Bulldogs on this ranch and thoroughly enjoy spending my time and life with my devoted canine companion, the most handsome, Mr Win, who is ever so debonair with his dapper tuxedo coat! Mare says Iâm the PERFECT breed ambassador, a GREAT companion and friend because I have a LOVELY disposition and a heart as big as all outdoors! Iâm just happy sheâs so pleased with me, but then Iâm a happy kinda gal anyway ~ serene and cheerful is what Iâm all about! I'm SUPER SMART, love to learn new things and do my utmost to be the BESTEST GIRL you'll ever meet because I'm absolutely DEVOTED to pleasing my human(s). Iâm looking for a special person(s) or a family of my own so I can stick by your side through thick and thin âcause Iâm the most LOYAL friend youâll ever encounter!

GORGEOUS LOOKS + STELLAR PERSONALITY = A VERY SPECIAL FIND !

Why wait??? Simply call Mare at (505)316-2089 for a private \"By Appointment Only\" showing at our \"Adoptions in the Park\" !!! Or contact us via our petabulls.com/adopt website. PLEASE include YOUR phone number on all inquiries as we are RARELY around the computer these days :) Open 10 am to 6 pm Wens thru Mon. Closed Tuesdays.

Come meet the PACK at our Simply Diego's (formerly Wild Pet Food Plus) Pet Adoption event Saturday, Sept 21st, from 12 noon to 5pm - 3301 Menaul Blvd NE Suite 10, Albuquerque, NM 87107. We hope to see YOU there !!!
